src: D-päev ja järgnevad lahingud vabastasid Prantsusmaa põhjaosa, kuid lõunaosa ei olnud endiselt vaba. Seal valitsesid Vichy prantslased. Need olid Prantsusmaa inimesed, kes sõlmisid 1940. aastal sakslastega rahu ja tegid sissetungijatega koostööd, selle asemel, et nendega võidelda. Liitlased tungisid 15. augustil 1940 Lõuna-Prantsusmaale, seda aktsiooni hakati nimetama operatsiooniks Dragoon. Ainult kahe nädalaga olid ameeriklased ja vabastatud Prantsuse väed vabastanud Prantsusmaa lõunaosa ning pöördusid Saksamaa poole.
mt: 15 August 1944, the D-Day and following battles freed northern France, but southern France was not yet free. There, the Vichy French ruled, who were French people who made a peace with the Germans in 1940 and did cooperation with the invaders instead of fighting them. The Allies invaded southern France on 15 August 1944, this action was called Operation Dragoon. Only two weeks later, the Americans and the liberated French forces had freed southern France and turned towards Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: D-päev ja järgnevad lahingud vabastasid Prantsusmaa põhjaosa, kuid lõunaosa ei olnud endiselt vaba. Seal valitsesid Vichy prantslased. Need olid Prantsusmaa inimesed, kes sõlmisid 1940. aastal sakslastega rahu ja tegid sissetungijatega koostööd, selle asemel, et nendega võidelda. Liitlased tungisid 15. augustil 1940 Lõuna-Prantsusmaale, seda aktsiooni hakati nimetama operatsiooniks Dragoon. Ainult kahe nädalaga olid ameeriklased ja vabastatud Prantsuse väed vabastanud Prantsusmaa lõunaosa ning pöördusid Saksamaa poole.
mt: 15 August 1944, the D-Day and following battles freed northern France, but southern France was not yet free. There, the Vichy French ruled, who were French people who made a peace with the Germans in 1940 and did cooperation with the invaders instead of fighting them. The Allies invaded southern France on 15 August 1944, this action was called Operation Dragoon. Only two weeks later, the Americans and the liberated French forces had freed southern France and turned towards Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Allveelaevad on laevad, mis on loodud vee all sõitmiseks ja seal pikka aega püsimiseks. Allveelaevu kasutati nii esimeses kui ka teises maailmasõjas. Toona olid nad väga aeglased ja nende laskeulatus oli väga piiratud. Sõja alguses sõitsid nad enamasti mere peal, kuid radarite arenedes ja täpsemaks muutumisel olid allveelaevad sunnitud märkamatuks jäämise nimel vee alla sukelduma. Saksa allveelaevu kutsuti U-boat'ideks. Sakslased olid allveelaevade juhtimises ja kasutamises väga osavad. Kuna Saksamaa oli allveelaevadega edukas, ei arvata neid pärast sõda enam palju olevat.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to operate underwater and stay there for long periods of time. They were used in both the first and second world wars. At first they were very slow and had a very limited range. In the beginning they operated on the surface, but as radars became more accurate and widespread, submarines were forced to submerge to avoid detection. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very good at submarine design and operation. Since the Germans were successful with submarines, they are not thought of much after the war.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: 17. septembriks 1939 oli Poola kaitse juba murtud ning ainus lootus oli taganeda ja grupeeruda ümber mööda Rumeenia sillapead. Need plaanid aga luhtusid peaaegu üleöö, kui rohkem kui 800 000 Nõukogude Liidu Punaarmee sõdurit sisenesid ning lõid Valgevene ja Ukraina rinde pärast Poola idapoolsete alade vallutamist, rikkudes Riia rahulepingut, Nõukogude-Poola mitteagressioonipakti ning teisi nii kahe- kui ka mitmepoolseid rahvusvahelisi lepinguid.
mt: 17 September 1939, Poland's defense was already broken and the only hope was to retreat and regroup along the Romanian bridgehead. These plans were almost dashed overnight, when more than 800,000 Soviet Red Army soldiers invaded and broke through the Polish eastern front, conquering Poland's eastern territories, violating the Treaty of Riga, the Soviet-Polish non-aggression pact, and other bilateral and multilateral treaties.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: 17. septembriks 1939 oli Poola kaitse juba murtud ning ainus lootus oli taganeda ja grupeeruda ümber mööda Rumeenia sillapead. src: Itallaastel ei läinud Põhja-Aafrikas hästi peaaegu algusest. Nädal aega pärast seda, kui Itaalia kuulutas 10. juunil 1940 välja sõja, oli Suurbritannia 11. husaarirügement hõivanud Fort Capuzzo Liibüas. Bardiast ida pool toimunud varitsusrünnakus võtsid britid kinni Itaalia kümnenda armee peainseneri kindral Lastucci. Liibüa kindralkuberner ja Mussolini otsene pärija marssal Italo Balbo suri 28. juunil, kui teda tulistasid Tobrukis maandumisel oma poole sõdurid.
mt: It didn't go well for the Italians in North Africa from the start. A week after Italy declared war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had captured Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In a surprise attack in Bardia, east of Libya, the British captured the chief engineer of the Italian 10th Army, General Lastucci. Libya's governor-general and Mussolini's direct heir, Marshal Italo Balbo, died on June 28, when he was shot by his own soldiers while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tiibeti budism põhineb Buddha õpetustel, aga seda laiendati mahajaana armastuse tee ja mitmete india jooga tehnikatega. Põhimõtteliselt on Tiibeti budism väga lihtne. See hõlmab kundalini joogat, meditatsiooni ja kõikehõlmava armastuse teekonda. Joogapooside, hingamisharjutuste, mantrade ja visualiseeringute abil äratatakse Kundalini joogas Kundalini energia (valgustusenergia). Tiibeti meditatsiooni keskmeks on jumaluste jooga. Erinevate jumaluste visualiseerimise kaudu puhastatakse energiakanalid, aktiveeritakse tšakrad ja luuakse valgusatud teadvus.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but it was expanded with the Mahayana path of love and various Indian yoga techniques. Basically, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and the all-encompassing path of love. The yoga poses, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations awaken Kundalini energy (light energy) in Kundalini yoga. The center of Tibetan meditation is the yoga of deities. By visualizing different deities, energy channels are purified, chakras are activated and a lightened consciousness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Programm algas kell 8.30 õhtul kohaliku aja järgi (15.00 UTC). Üle kogu riigi esitasid lauljad bhajane ehk pühendatud laule Shri Shyami jalgadele. Õhtut alustas laulja Sanju Sharma, kellele järgnes Jai Shankar Choudhary. Siis võttis Lakkha Singh bhajanide laulmise üle. Baba Shyamile serveeriti 108 taldrikutäit Chhappan Bhogi (hinduismis pakuti jumalusele 56 erinevat toitu, näiteks maiustusi, puuvilju, pähkleid, roogasid jne). Lakkha Singh viis läbi ka chhappan bhog bhajan'i. Laulja Raju Khandelwal saatis teda.
mt: The program began at 8:30 pm local time (3:00 pm UTC). Singers from all over the country sang bhajans, or devotional songs, to the feet of Shri Shyam. The program began with singer Sanju Sharma, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. Then Lakkha Singh took over the singing of bhajans. Baba Shyam was served 108 plates of Chhappan Bhogi (in Hinduism, 56 different foods were offered to the god, such as desserts, fruits, nuts, grains, etc.). Lakkha Singh led the Chhappan Bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Pidustused algasid maailmakuulsa trupi Cirque du Soleil eri-show'ga. Sellele järgnesid Istanbuli riiklik sümfooniaorkester, Janissar band ning lauljad Fatih Erkoç ja Müslüm Gürses. Seejärel astusid lavale keerlevad dervišid. Türgi diiva Sezen Aksu esines koos itaallasest tenori Alessandro Safina ja kreeklasest laulja Haris Alexiouga. Lõpetuseks esitas türgi tantsu rühm Anatoolia tuli etteaste nimega „Trooja“.
mt: The festivities began with a Cirque du Soleil show. This was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, Janissar band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Next, whirling dervishes performed. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The festivities ended with a Turkish dance troupe performing a show called "Trojan".
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Reisijatele, kes ootasid 90-kraadises (F) kuumuses, anti vett. ""Tuletõrjeülem Scott Kouns ütles: """"Tegemist oli kuuma päevaga Santa Claras, mil temperatuurid ulatusid 90-ndate soojuskraadideni."" ""Pole vahet kui kauaks """"Ameerika mägede"""" atraktsioonile lõksu jäädakse, see oleks ikkagi tagasihoidlikult öeldes ebamugav, ja läks vähemalt tund aega, et esimene inimene karussellilt ära saada."""
mt: "Passengers waiting in 90-degree (F) heat were given water. ""Fire Chief Scott Kouns said: ""It was a hot day in Santa Clarita, with temperatures in the 90s."" ""It's not like you're going to be stuck in ""America's mountains"" for a long time, which would be at least somewhat uncomfortable, and it took at least a few minutes for the first person to get off the ride."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Uusima bülletääni kohaselt näitasid merepinna taseme andmed, et moodustus tsunami. Pago Pago ja Niue lähistel tuvastati kindlasti tsunami tegevust. Tongas pole teatatud suurematest kahjustustest ega vigastustest, kuid ajutiselt kadus elekter, mistõttu ei saanud Tonga võimud kätte PTWC edastatud tsunamihoiatust. Hawaiil suleti terveks kolmapäevaks 14 kooli, mis asuvad rannikul või selle lähedal, hoolimata sellest, et hoiatused võeti tagasi.
mt: The latest bulletin reported that sea level data showed a tsunami had formed. A tsunami was confirmed in the vicinity of Pago Pago and Niue. There were no reports of major damage or injuries in Tonga, but the power was temporarily lost, preventing the Tongan authorities from receiving the PTWC tsunami warning. Schools on the island of Hawaii were closed for the entire day on Wednesday, March 14, due to the tsunami warning, despite the cancellation of the warning.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, A1GP Uus-Meremaa meeskonna kaasjuht, tegi täna ajalugu, sõites kõige kiiremini üle 48-aastase Aucklandi sadama silla seaduslikult. Hr Reidil õnnestus sõita Uus-Meremaa A1GP-sõidukiga Black Beauty üle silla kiirustel üle 160 km/h seitse korda. Kuna Must Iludus oli väga madal, oli Uus-Meremaa politseil oma kiirusradaripüstolitega härra Reidi sõidukiirust raske mõõta; politseil õnnestus härra Reid „radarisse püüda” ainult siis, kui ta aeglustas kiirust 160 km/h.
mt: Johnny Reid, co-driver of the New Zealand A1GP team, made history today by driving over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand A1GP car Black Beauty over the bridge at speeds over 160 km/h seven times. As the Black Beauty was very low, it was hard for New Zealand police to measure Mr Reid's speed with their radar guns; the police managed to "lock" Mr Reid's speed at 160 km/h only when he slowed down.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Jonny Reid, A1GP Uus-Meremaa meeskonna kaasjuht, tegi täna ajalugu, sõites kõige kiiremini üle 48-aastase Aucklandi sadama silla seaduslikult. Hr Reidil õnnestus sõita Uus-Meremaa A1GP-sõidukiga Black Beauty üle silla kiirustel üle 160 km/h seitse korda. Kuna Must Iludus oli väga madal, oli Uus-Meremaa politseil oma kiirusradaripüstolitega härra Reidi sõidukiirust raske mõõta; politseil õnnestus härra Reid „radarisse püüda” ainult siis, kui ta aeglustas kiirust 160 km/h.
mt: Johnny Reid, co-driver of the New Zealand A1GP team, made history today by driving over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand A1GP car Black Beauty over the bridge at speeds over 160 km/h seven times. As the Black Beauty was very low, it was hard for New Zealand police to measure Mr Reid's speed with their radar guns; the police managed to "lock" Mr Reid's speed at 160 km/h only when he slowed down.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Lääne-Montanat raputas esmaspäeval kell 22:08 mõõdukas maavärin. Ameerika Ühendriikide Geoloogiateenistusele (USGS) ja riiklikule maavärinate teabekeskusele pole laekunud vahetuid teateid kahjustuste kohta. Maavärina kese asus umbes 20 km (15 miili) Dillonist põhjakirde suunas ja umbes 65 km (40 miili) Butte’ist lõuna pool.
mt: A magnitude 2.8 earthquake struck Western Montana at 10:08 pm local time. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center have not received any reports of damage. The epicenter was about 20 km (15 miles) north of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Iraagi Abu Ghraibi vangla pandi mässu käigus põlema. Vangla sai kurikuulsaks, kui pärast Ameerika Ühendriikide vägede ülevõttu avastati, et seal kuritarvitati vange.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set on fire during a riot. The prison became notorious when, after being seized by American forces, it was discovered that prisoners were being mistreated.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Bänd tühistas kontserdi Maui sõjamemoriaali staadiumil, kus pidi osalema 9000 inimest, ja vabandas fännide ees. Bändi administreeriv HK Management Inc. ei andnud 20. septembril tühistamise kohta esialgset põhjust, kuid järgmisel päeval süüdistas logistilisi põhjuseid.
mt: The band canceled a concert at the stadium of the Maui War Memorial, where 9000 people were expected to attend, and apologized to fans. The band's administrator, HK Management Inc., did not give an initial reason for the cancellation on September 20, but the next day blamed logistical reasons.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Ulatuslik rüüstamine jätkus väidetavalt kogu öö, kuna korrakaitsjaid polnud Bishkeki tänavatel. Ühe pealtvaataja sõnul puhkes Biškekis justkui anarhia, inimjõugud hulkusid tänavatel ja rüüstasid poode tarbijakaupade röövimiseks. Mitmed Biškeki elanikud süüdistasid lõunast pärit protestijaid anarhias.
mt: The looting continued throughout the night, according to reports, as police were not on the streets of Bishkek. One eyewitness said Bishkek was like anarchy, crowds of people roamed the streets and looted shops for consumer goods. Many Bishkek residents blamed the southern protesters for the anarchy.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Ringi tegevdirektor Jamie Siminoff on varem maininud, et ettevõte sai alguse sellest, kui ta ei kuulnud garaažis asuvasse töökotta uksekella helinat. „Ta ehitas Wi-Fi-ga uksekella,“ ütles ta. Siminoff ütles, et müük hoogustus pärast seda, kui ta osales 2013. aastal saate „Shark Tank” episoodis, milles saate ekspertide kogu keeldus startupi rahastamisest. 2017. aasta lõpus esines Siminoff ostukanalil QVC. Ring tegi kokkuleppemenetluse ka konkureeriva turvafirma, ADT Corporationiga.
mt: Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff has previously said the company was founded when he didn't hear the doorbell ring in his garage. "He built a Wi-Fi-enabled doorbell," he said. Siminoff said sales took off after he appeared on the reality show "Shark Tank" in 2013, when all the show's experts refused to invest in the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC. Ring also reached an agreement with competitor ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "PBS-i sarjal on rohkem kui kaks tosinat Emmy auhinda ja sellest kauem on kestnud vaid sarjad „Sesame Street” ja „Mister Rogers' Neighborhood”. Saate iga osa keskendus konkreetses raamatus olevale teemale ja käsitles seda teemat mitmes loos. Igas saates soovitati ka raamatuid, mida lapsed peaksid raamatukogusse minnes otsima. ""John Grant jaamast WNED Buffalo (saate „Reading Rainbow"""" kodujaam) ütles: „Saade „Reading Rainbow"""" õpetas lastele, miks lugeda, ... lugemisarmastust — [saade] julgustas lapsi raamatut kätte võtma ja lugema."""""" Mõned, sh John Grant, usuvad, et nii rahastuse piiramine kui ka haridusliku televisiooni filosoofia muutumine aitasid kaasa seriaali lõppemisele."
mt: "PBS series has won more than two dozen Emmys and is the longest-running children's show on television, after "Sesame Street" and "Mister Rogers' Neighborhood." Each episode focused on a specific book and explored the book's theme in multiple episodes. Each episode also recommended books that children should look for in the library. ""John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (the home station for "Reading Rainbow") said, "Reading Rainbow" taught children why to read,... reading love — [the show] encouraged children to pick up a book and read.""""" Some, including John Grant, believe that both funding cuts and the changing philosophy of educational television contributed to the series' end.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amsterdami linnaametnikud ja Anne Franki muuseum väidavad, et puu on seenega nakatunud ja on ohtlik inimeste tervisele, vaieldes, et puu oli kohe ümber kukkumise ohus. See plaaniti teisipäeval maha võtta, kuid jäeti erakorralise kohtuotsusega alles.
mt: Amsterdam city officials and the Anne Frank Museum claim the tree is infected with a fungus and is a threat to public health, disputing that the tree was immediately in danger of falling over. It was planned to be removed on Monday, but was left alone by a special court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Loomade vabastamise organisatsioon ja Kuninglik loomakaitseühing (RSPCA) nõuavad taas CCTC kaamerate kohustuslikku paigaldamist kõikidesse Austraalia tapamajadesse. RSPCA New South Walesi peainspektor David O'Shannessy ütles ABC-le, et tapamajade järelevalve ja ülevaatused peaksid Austraalias üldlevinud olema. """"""Valvekaamera annaks nendele loomadega töötavatele inimestele kindlasti selgelt mõista, et loomade heaolu on esmatähtis."""""""
mt: "The animal liberation organisation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that the inspection and audits of abattoirs should be widespread in Australia. """"""A CCTV camera would certainly make it clear to those working with animals that animal welfare is paramount."""""""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Täna levisid Jeff Weise'i ja üheksast ohvrist kolme matuseid pidavas Red Lake'i kogukonnas uudised, et 21. märtsi koolitulistamisega seoses on arreteeritud veel üks õpilane. Ametivõimud ei avaldanud ametlikult kuigivõrd infot peale tänase kinnipidamise kinnitamise. Uurimise käigust teadlik allikas ütles Minneapolise Star-Tribune'ile, et see oli Louis Jourdain, Red Lake'i hõimu esimehe Floyd Jourdaini 16-aastane poeg. Praegu pole teada, milline on esitatav süüdistus või kuidas ametivõimud poisini jõudsid, kuid föderaalkohtus on alanud alaealist puudutav menetlus.
mt: 21 March school shooting in Red Lake, Minnesota, was the subject of news in the community that was holding three funerals for the nine victims today. One more student was arrested in connection with the shooting. Authorities have not officially confirmed the arrest. A source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that the student was Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake's tribal chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known what the charges are or how authorities came to the boy, but a federal court hearing for a juvenile is underway.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Protesti korraldajate sõnul tuli ligi 100 000 inimest kokku Saksamaa linnades, nagu Berliinis, Kölnis, Hamburgis ja Hanoveris. Politsei hinnangul oli Berliinis 6500 meeleavaldajat. Protestid leidsid aset ka Pariisis, Bulgaarias Sofias, Leedus Vilniuses, Maltal Valettas, Eestis Tallinnas ning Šotimaal Edinburgis ja Glascows. Londonis protesteeris umbes 200 inimest väljaspool mõnda suuremat autoriõiguste omanike kontorit. Möödunud kuul oli Poolas palju proteste, kui riik allkirjastas ACTA lepingu, mistõttu otsustas Poola valitsus praeguse seisuga lepingut mitte ratifitseerida. Läti ja Slovakkia on mõlemad ACTA-ga liitumise protsessi edasi lükanud.
mt: 100,000 people gathered in cities across Germany, including Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, according to organizers. Police estimated 6,500 protesters in Berlin. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia, Vilnius, Valletta, Tallinn, Edinburgh and Glasgow. About 200 people protested outside a major copyright owners' office in London. In the previous month, Poland had many protests when the country signed the ACTA treaty, so the Polish government has decided not to ratify the treaty at this time. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Teada on antud umbes 60 iPodi rikke juhtumist ülekuumenemise tõttu, mis kokku on põhjustanud kuus tulekahju ja tekitanud neljale inimesele kergemaid põletushaavu. Jaapani majandus-, kaubandus- ja tööstusministeeriumi (METI) andmetel oli seadmetega seotud 27 õnnetusjuhtumit. Eelmisel nädalal kuulutas METI, et Apple on neid teavitanud 34st täiendavast ülekuumenemise juhtumist, mida ettevõtte nimetas „mitte tõsisteks”. ""Vastuseks nimetas ministeerium Apple'i aruande edasilükkamist """"tõeliselt kahetsusväärseks""""."""
mt: 60 iPods have been reported to have overheated, causing six fires and minor burns to four people. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) reported 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had notified them of 34 additional overheating incidents, which Apple called "not serious". In response, METI called Apple's report "truly regrettable".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Apple'i tegevdirektor Steve Jobs avalikustas seadme, kõndides lavale ja võttes iPhone'i teksade taskust välja. Oma kahetunnise kõne ajal ütles ta: „Täna leiutab Apple telefoni uuesti. Me teeme täna ajalugu.”
mt: Apple executive Steve Jobs unveiled the device on stage, removing it from a glass case. During his two-hour presentation, he said: "Today Apple reinvents the phone. We've done it again."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Praegune senaator ja Argentiina esimene leedi Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner teatas eile õhtul Buenos Airesest 50 kilomeetri (31 miili) kaugusel asuvas La Platas oma presidendiks kandideerimisest. Proua Kirchner teatas oma presidendiks kandideerimise kavatsusest teatris Argentine, samas kohas, kust ta alustas oma 2005. aasta senatikampaaniat Buenos Airese provintsi delegatsiooni liikmena.
mt: Current senator and Argentina's first lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president in a theater in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, yesterday evening. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president in the same place where she started her 2005 senatorial campaign as a delegate from Buenos Aires province.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA leidis ka, et kuigi videot voogedastati internetis, ei olnud „Big Brother” rikkunud veebisisu tsensuuri seadusi, kuna meediat ei salvestatud „Big Brotheri” veebilehele. Ringhäälingu teenuste seadus määratleb interneti sisu reguleerimise, kuid selleks, et seda peetaks interneti sisuks, peab see füüsiliselt ühes serveris asuma.
mt: ACMA also found that while the video was streamed on the internet, "Big Brother" had not breached web site censorship laws, as the media was not uploaded to the "Big Brother" website. The Broadcasting Services Act defines the regulation of internet content, but for it to be considered internet content, it must be physically located on one server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Peter Costello, kes on Austraalia laekur ja mees, kes kõige tõenäolisemalt edastab peaminister John Howardit liberaalse partei juhina, on andnud oma toetuse tuumaenergiatööstusele Austraalias. Hr Costello ütles, et kui tuumaenergia valmistamine muutub majanduslikult mõeldavaks, siis peaks Austraalia selle kasutuselevõtmist taotlema. „Kui see muutub kaubanduslikuks, peaksime selle hankima. See tähendab, põhimõttelist vastuseisu tuumaenergiale pole,“ ütles hr Costello.
mt: Peter Costello, who is Australia's treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has given his support to the nuclear energy industry in Australia. Mr Costello said if the manufacture of nuclear energy becomes economically feasible, Australia should seek to use it. "If it becomes commercial, we should get it. That means there is no fundamental opposition to nuclear energy," Mr Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Kuna igal päeval on saadaval ainult 18 medalit, pole paljud riigid jõudnud poodiumile. Nende hulgas on Holland, kelle esindaja Anna Jochemsen oli eile naiste püstises ülisuurslaalomis üheksandal kohal, ja Soome, kelle Katja Saarinen saavutas samas distsipliinis kümnenda koha. Austraallane Mitchell Gourley lõpetas meeste istuva ülisuurslaalomi võistluse üheteistkümnendana. Tšehhi võistleja Oldrich Jelinek lõpetas meeste istuva ülisuurslaalomi kuueteistkümnendal kohal. Mehhikost pärit Arly Velasquez lõpetas meeste istuva ülisuurslaalomi viieteistkümnendal kohal. Uus-Meremaalt pärit Adam Hall lõpetas meeste seisva ülisuurslaalomi üheksandal kohal. Poola nägemispuudega meessuusataja Maciej Krezel ja juht Anna Ogarzynska saavutasid ülisuurslaalomis kolmeteistkümnenda koha. Lõuna-Korea esindaja Jong Seork Park lõpetas meeste istuvas ülisuurslaalomis kahekümne neljanda kohaga.
mt: 18 medals are available each day, so many countries have not yet reached the podium. Among them are the Netherlands, whose representative Anna Jochemsen was 17th in the women's slalom, and Finland, whose Katja Saarinen finished 20th in the same discipline. Australian Mitchell Gourley finished 31st in the men's slalom. Oldrich Jelinek of the Czech Republic finished 32nd in the men's slalom. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished 35th in the men's slalom. Adam Hall of New Zealand finished 17th in the men's slalom. Maciej Krezel and Anna Ogarzynska of Poland finished 34th in the slalom. Jong Seork Park of South Korea finished 24th in the men's slalom.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Kohtuprotsess toimus Birminghami Crown Courti kohtus ja sai läbi 3. augustil. Sündmuskohal vahistatud saatejuht eitas rünnakut ja väitis, et ta kasutas masti selleks, et kaitsta ennast pudelite eest, millega umbes kolmkümmend inimest teda viskasid. Blake mõisteti süüdi ka õigusemõistmise takistamise katses. Kohtunik ütles Blake'ile, et vangiminek on peaaegu vältimatu.
mt: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter was arrested at the scene and denied the attack, claiming he used the stick to protect himself from missiles thrown by about thirty people. Blake was also convicted of obstructing justice. The judge told Blake that imprisonment is almost inevitable.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Bali päevakava muude teemade hulka kuuluvad maailmas allesjäänud metsade päästmine ja tehnoloogiate jagamine, millega aidata arengumaadel kasvada vähem saastavate viisidega. ÜRO loodab ka lõpetada fondi loomise, mis aitaks kliimasoojenemisest mõjutatud riikidel tagajärgedega hakkama saada. Raha saaks kasutada üleujutuskindlate majade ehitamiseks, paremaks veehalduseks ja saagi mitmekesistamiseks.
mt: The agenda also includes saving the world's remaining forests and sharing technologies that help developing countries grow with less pollution. The UN also hopes to end the creation of a fund to help climate change-affected countries cope with the consequences. Money could be used to build flood-resistant homes, improve water management and diversify crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Eelnevalt teatas Nigeeria, et plaanib ühineda Aafrika Mandri Vabakaubanduspiirkonnaga (AfCFTA) tippkohtumisele eelneval nädalal. AL-i kaubanduse ja tööstuse volinik Albert Muchanga teatas, et Benin liitub. Erivolinik ütles: „Me pole veel leppinud kokku päritolureeglites ja tariifi soodustustes, kuid meie raamistikust piisab, et alustada kauplemist 1. juulil 2020.”
mt: Nigeria previously announced that it would join the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) at a summit next week. The AU’s trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga said Benin would join. The commissioner said: “We have not yet agreed on the rules of origin and tariff concessions, but our framework is sufficient to start trading on July 1, 2020.”
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Atlantas olles sai ta suure kiituse osaliseks ja teda tunnustati uuendusliku linnahariduse eest. 2009. aastal autasustati teda aasta riikliku juhataja tiitliga. Auhinna andmise ajal oli Atlanta koolide testide tulemustes märgata suuri edusamme. Peatselt avaldati ajalehes Atlanta Journal-Constitution aruanne, mis tõi välja katse tulemuste probleemid. Aruandest selgus, et testide punktisummad olid ebausutavalt kiiresti kasvanud, ning väidetavalt avastas kool siseprobleeme, kuid ei tegutsenud järelduste põhjal. Seejärel viitasid tõendid sellele, et teste oli võltsinud Hall koos 34 teise haridusametnikuga, kellele esitati süüdistus 2013. aastal.
mt: While in Atlanta, she received praise for her role in the city's education system and was recognized for her innovative work in urban education. In 2009, she was named Georgia's Superintendent of the Year. Shortly after the award was given, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that revealed problems with the city's test scores. The report showed that the city's test scores had increased dramatically, and that the school system had identified problems but failed to act on them. Subsequently, evidence emerged that the tests had been tampered with by Hall and 34 other education officials, who were charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Üks pomm plahvatas kindralkuberneri kontori läheduses. Valitsushoonete läheduses plahvatas veel kolm pommi kahe tunni vältel. Mõnede andmete kohaselt on ametlik hukkunute arv kaheksa ja ametlikud andmed kinnitavad, et ligi 30 inimest said vigastada; kuid lõplikud arvud ei ole veel teada.
mt: 1 bomb exploded near the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings over a two hour period. Some reports say eight are dead and official reports confirm that nearly 30 were injured; however, final numbers are not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21-aastane Jesus liitus Manchester Cityga eelmisel aastal, 2017. aasta jaanuaris, Brasiilia klubist Palmeiras väidetavalt 27 miljoni naela suuruse üleminekusummaga. Sellest ajast alates on brasiillane osalenud 53 klubi mängul ja löönud 24 väravat.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City in January 2017, reportedly for a transfer fee of £27 million from Brazilian club Palmeiras. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games for the club and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Islami pühas linnas Mekas varises täna hommikul, kohaliku aja järgi umbes kell 10, kokku hostel. Hoones oli terve hulk palverändureid, kes saabusid pühasse linna hadži palverännaku eelõhtul. Hosteli külastajateks on põhiliselt Araabia Ühendemiraatide kodanikud. Hukkunute arv on vähemalt 15 ja arvatakse, et see arv tõuseb.
mt: A hostel in the holy city of Mecca collapsed this morning, local time around 10:00, killing at least 15 people, mostly Saudi citizens, and the death toll is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Satelliidid, mis mõlemad kaalusid üle 1000 naela ja liikusid kiirusega umbes 17 500 miili tunnis, põrkasid kokku 491 miili kõrgusel Maa kohal. Teadlaste sõnul oli kokkupõrke põhjustatud plahvatus tohutu. Nad püüavad endiselt välja selgitada, kui suur kokkupõrge oli ja kuidas see Maad mõjutab. Ameerika Ühendriikide kaitseministeeriumi kantselei strateegiline väejuhatus jälgib rususid. Trajektooride analüüsimise tulemused postitatakse avalikule veebilehele.
mt: Two satellites, each weighing over 1000 pounds and traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the collision was caused by a massive explosion. They are still trying to determine how big the collision was and how it affects the Earth. The U.S. Department of Defense's Joint Functional Component Command for Space is monitoring the debris. Trajectory analysis results are posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten oli 2008. aastal 400 rikkaima ameeriklase edetabelis 190. kohal, tema varanduse suuruseks oli hinnanguliselt 2,3 miljardit dollarit. Ta lõpetas 1950. aastal Virginia ülikooli kunstide ja teaduste kolledži ja oli sellele institutsioonile märkimisväärseks annetajaks.
mt: Batten was ranked 190th on the Forbes 400 list of richest Americans in 2008, with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a major benefactor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: California kuberner Arnold Schwarzenegger allkirjastas seaduseks eelnõu, mis keelab vägivaldsete videomängude müügi või rentimise alaealistele. Seaduseelnõu nõuab, et California osariigis müüdavatel videomängudel oleks silt kirjaga „18” ja nende müümine alaealisele oleks karistatav 1000 dollari suuruse trahviga rikkumise kohta.
mt: California governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill into law that prohibits the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that video games sold in California have a label stating "18" and that selling a game to a minor is punishable by a fine of up to $1000.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvall, kes on abielus ja kellel on kaks last, ei jätnud Millerile, kellele seda lugu jutustati, väga sügavat mulje. ""Kui Millerilt kommentaari paluti, vastas ta: """"Mike räägib kohtuistungil palju ...Olin alles valmistumas ja seega ei kuulnud eriti, mida ta ütles."""""""
mt: "Duvall, who is married and has two children, did not leave Miller with a very deep impression. ""When Miller was asked for a comment, he replied: """"Mike talks a lot...I was just getting ready and so I didn't hear much of what he said."""""""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Peaminister Stephen Harper nõustus pärast teisipäevast 25-minutilist kohtumist NDP juhi Jack Laytoniga peaministri kabinetis saatma valitsuse puhta õhu seaduse läbivaatuseks kõikide parteide liikmetega komiteele enne teist lugemist. Layton rääkis kohtumisel peaministriga konservatiivide keskkonnaeelnõu muutmisest, nõudes Konservatiivse erakonna keskkonnaeelnõu „põhjalikku ja täielikku ümberkirjutamist“. Alates sellest ajast, kui föderaalvalitsus asjasse sekkus ja Mersey haigla, mis asub Tasmaanias Devonportis, rahastamise üle võttis, on osariigi valitsus ning mõned föderaalvalitsuse parlamendiliikmed seda kritiseerinud, nimetades seda trikiks, mis on sissejuhatuseks Novembris väljakuulutatavatele föderaalvalimistele. Kuid peaminister John Howard sõnas, et see tegu oli vajalik ainult haigla kvaliteedi kaitsemiseks Tasmaania valitsuse eest, mille nimel anti haiglale lisaks 45 miljonit Austraalia dollarit.
mt: Harper agreed to send the government's clean air bill to committee for review by all parties before second reading after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in the prime minister's office. Layton spoke to Harper about the Conservative party's environment bill, asking for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the bill. Since the federal government intervened and took over funding for the Mersey Hospital, which is located in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal parliamentarians have criticized the move, calling it a trick to pave the way for federal elections in November. But Prime Minister John Howard said the move was necessary only to protect the quality of the hospital from the state government, which gave the hospital an additional $45 million Australian dollars.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Pärast saastunud loomatoidu söömist surnud lemmikloomade uriiniproovist leiti nii tsüanuurhapet kui ka melamiini. Kaks ühendit moodustavad omavahel reageerides kristallid, mis võivad neerude tööd takistada, ütlesid ülikooli uurijad. Teadlased täheldasid, et kassi uriinis moodustusid melamiini ja tsüanuurhappe lisamisel kristallid. Nende kristallide koostis ühtib kristallidega, mis on leitud mõjutatud lemmikloomade uriinis, kui neid võrreldi infrapunaspektroskoopiaga.
mt: After eating tainted pet food, the urine of dead pets tested positive for cyanuric acid and melamine. The two compounds form crystals when they react with each other, said university researchers. They found that crystals formed when melamine and cyanuric acid were added to a cat's urine. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of pets affected by tainted pet food, when compared with infrared spectroscopy.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua teavitas, et valitsuse uurijad said kolmapäeval tagasi kaks lennuki must kasti pardasalvestist. Ka maadlejatest kolleegid avaldasid Lunale austust. Tommy Dreamer ütles: „Luna oli esimene ekstreemsuse kuninganna. Minu esimene mänedžer. Luna lahkus meie seast kahe kuu ööl. Päris ainulaadne, just tema moodi. Tugev naine.” ""Dustin """"Goldust"""" Runnels kommenteeris, et """"Luna oli sama imelik kui mina … võib-olla isegi imelikum … armastan teda ja igatsen teda … loodetavasti on ta nüüd paremas kohas."""""""
mt: "Xinhua reported that the government's investigators got back two black boxes from the plane's flight data recorders. Also, wrestling colleagues paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first queen of extreme. My first manager. Luna left our ranks at two o'clock in the morning. A very unique person, just like her. A strong woman." "Dustin """"Goldust"""" Runnels commented that """"Luna was as strange as I am … maybe even stranger … I love her and miss her … I hope she is in a better place."""""""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Kui auto maja tabas, viibis seal kolm inimest, kuid keegi neist ei saanud viga. Juht sai siiski tõsiseid peavigastusi. Tee, kus kokkupõrge toimus, suleti ajutiselt, kuniks päästeteenistus vabastas punase Audi TT juhi. Algselt viidi ta haiglaravile James Paget'i haiglasse Great Yarmouthis. Seejärel viidi ta üle Cambridge'is asuvasse Addenbrooke'i haiglasse.
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car hit it, but none were injured. The driver did sustain serious facial injuries. The road where the crash occurred was closed temporarily until the fire department freed the red Audi TT driver. He was initially taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was then transferred to the Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Mängud algasid ilusa ilmaga kell 10:00 ja peale keskhommikust uduvihma, mis kiiresti selgines, oli see suurepärane päev ragbi-7 jaoks. Turniiri esimese lähteväärtuse saanud Lõuna-Aadrika alustas õige jalaga, saades mugava 26 : 00 võidu viienda lähteväärtusega Zambia üle. Oma lõunapoolsete naabrite vastu mängides jättis Lõuna-Aafrika väga roostes mulje, parandades turniiri edenedes end siiski pidevalt. Nende distsiplineeritud kaitse, pallikäsitsemisoskused ja suurepärane meeskonnatöö tõstis neid esile ning oli selge, et võidu jaoks tuleb nendest jagu saada.
mt: The games began with beautiful weather at 10:00 and after a midday mist, which quickly cleared, it was a great day for rugby 7s. The first team to score in the tournament, South Africa, started with the right foot, getting a comfortable 26 : 00 win over Zambia, the fifth team to score. Against their southern neighbors, South Africa left a very rusty impression, improving their tournament position, but still. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and great teamwork put them in the spotlight and it was clear that they had to be taken from them.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Viimase kolme aastakümne jooksul on Hiina, kuigi see on ametlikult ikkagi kommunistlik riik, välja arendanud turumajanduse. Esimesed majandusreformid tehti Deng Xiaopingi juhtimisel. Sellest ajast on hiina majanduslik suurus kasvanud 90-kordselt. Eelmisel aastal eksportis Hiina esimest korda rohkem autosid kui Saksamaa ja edastas Ühendriike, saades suurimaks turuks selles valdkonnas. Hiina SKP võib ületada Ameerika Ühendriikide oma kahekümne aasta jooksul.
mt: In the last three decades, China, although still officially a communist country, has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, the Chinese economy has grown 90-fold. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States in this field. China's GDP may surpass that of the United States in twenty years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: „Võtame eesmärgiks vähendada 2020. aastaks süsinikdioksiidi heitkoguseid SKT ühiku kohta võrreldes 2005. aasta tasemega märkimisväärselt,” ütles Hu. Ta ei määranud kärbetele rahalist väärtust, öeldes, et need sõltuvad Hiina majandustulemustest. Hu õhutas arenguriike „vältima vana rada, mille käigus kõigepealt saastati ja hiljem koristati”. Ta lisas veel, et „neil ei tohiks paluda võtta kohustusi, mis on nende arenguetapist, vastutusvõimest ja võimetest üle.”
mt: "Our goal is to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount by 2020 compared to 2005," Hu said. He did not put a price tag on the cuts, saying they would depend on China's economic performance. Hu urged developing countries "to avoid the old path of first polluting and then cleaning up." He added that "they should not be asked to take on commitments that are beyond their level of development, capacity and capability."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Meditsiiniline heategevusühing Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres ja Maailma Terviseorganisatsioon ütlevad, et see on kõige hullem haiguspuhang, mis on riigis registreeritud. Piirideta arstide eestkõneleja Richard Veerman ütles: „Angolat ootab aegade raskeim puhang ja sealne olukord on endiselt väga halb.”
mt: Medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organization say this is the worst outbreak of disease ever recorded in the country. Richard Veerman, spokesman for the charity Médecins Sans Frontières, said: "Angola is facing the worst outbreak in history and the situation is still very bad."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Prokuratuuri direktor Keir Starmer (Queen's Counsel) tegi täna hommikul avalduse, milles teatas nii Huhne’i kui ka Pryce’i süüdimõistmisest. Huhne astus tagasi ja tema kohale kabinetis asub parlamendiliige Ed Davey. Parlamendiliige Norman Lamb saab arvatavasti ettevõtlusministri koha, kust Davey lahkub. Huhne ja Pryce peavad plaani kohaselt 16. veebruaril Westminsteri magistraadikohtusse ilmuma.
mt: Prosecution Director Keir Starmer (Queen's Counsel) made a statement this morning, announcing the conviction of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and his place in the cabinet will be taken by Ed Davey, a member of parliament. Norman Lamb is expected to take the business secretary position, which Davey will vacate. Huhne and Pryce are expected to appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Camille Saint-Saensi prantsuse ooper räägib loo kunstnikust, „kelle elu dikteerib armastus uimastite ja Jaapani vastu“. Seetõttu suitsetavad esinejad laval kanepisuitsu ja teater ise julgustab publikut nendega ühinema.
mt: Camille Saint-Saens' French opera tells the story of an artist, "whose life is dictated by love of opium and Japan."  As a result, the performers on stage smoke cannabis and the theater itself encourages the audience to join them.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonov, tuntud ka kui „kosmonaut nr 11”, kuulus Nõukogude Liidu algsesse kosmonautide meeskonda. 18. märtsil 1965 tegi ta esimese mehitatud sõidukivälise tegevuse (EVA) ehk kosmosekõnni, olles kosmoselaevast väljas veidi üle kaheteistkümne minuti. Ta sai oma töö eest Nõukogude Liidu kõrgeima autasu Nõukogude Liidu kangelane. Kümme aastat hiljem juhtis ta Apollo-Soyuzi Nõukogude osa, mis tähistas kosmose võidujooksu lõppu.
mt: Leonov, known as "cosmonaut no. 11", was a member of the original Soviet space program. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extra-vehicular activity (EVA) or spacewalk, being outside the spacecraft for about 12 minutes. He was awarded the highest Soviet award, Hero of the Soviet Union, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet side of the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, which marked the end of the space race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Pärast õnnetuse toimumist transporditi Gibson haiglasse, kuid ta suri varsti pärast seda. Kokkupõrkes ei saanud vigastada 64-aastane veokijuht. Sõiduk ise viidi õnnetuskohalt ära samal päeval umbes kell 12.00 Greenwichi aja järgi. Õnnetuse lähedal garaažis töötanud isik ütles: „Seal olid lapsed, kes ootasid tee ületamist ja nad kõik hakkasid nutma ja karjuma.” Kõik nad jooksid õnnetuse toimumispaigast tagasi.
mt: After the crash, Gibson was taken to the hospital, but died shortly after. The truck driver, 64, was not injured. The aircraft was removed from the crash site the same day at around 12:00 Greenwich Mean Time. A person working in a nearby garage said, "There were children waiting to cross the road, and they all started crying and screaming." All of them ran back from the crash site.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Tehtud töö oli enamjaolt teoreetiline, kuid programm kirjutati selleks, et stimuleerida Amburi galaktikast tehtavaid vaatlusi. Efekti, mida meeskond otsis, põhjustaksid galaktika tumeaine ja Linnutee tumeaine vahelised loodete jõud. Just nii nagu kuu avaldab maale tõmbejõudu, põhjustades mõõnasid, avaldab Linnutee jõudu Amburi galaktikale. Teadlased jõudsid järeldusele, et tumeaine mõjutab teisi tumedaid aineid samamoodi nagu tavaaine. See teooria ütleb, et enamik tumeainet, mis on galaktika ümber, asub galaktika ümber kroonina, ja see koosneb paljudest väikestest osakestest.
mt: The work was largely theoretical, but the team wrote a program to simulate the observations of the Andromeda galaxy. The effect they were looking for was caused by dark matter and the dark matter of the Milky Way between the galaxies. Just as the moon exerts tidal forces on the Earth, the dark matter exerts tidal forces on the Andromeda galaxy. The scientists concluded that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as normal matter. This theory says that most of the dark matter that surrounds the galaxy is in a halo around the galaxy, and it is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Vaidlus sai alguse orkaan Katrina järgse abi ja ülesehitamise vasturääkivustest, mida osa rahanduskonservatiive kutsuvad naljatledes Bushi New Orleansi tehinguks. Rekonstruktsioonipingutuste liberaalne kriitika keskendus rekonstruktsioonilepingute andmisele teada tuntud Washingtoni kaaskondlastele.
mt: The dispute began over post-Katrina aid and reconstruction criticism, which some fiscal conservatives called a joke by Bush's New Orleans project. Liberal criticism of reconstruction contracts focused on the giving of reconstruction contracts to Bush's known Washington cronies.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "Kui kapsel umbes kell 5 hommikul (idaranniku aeg) Maale jõuab ja atmosfääri siseneb, võivad Põhja-California, Oregoni, Nevada ja Utahi elanikud oodata päris uhket valgusemängu. Kapsel on üsna sarnane üle taeva liikuva langeva tähega. Kapsel lendab umbes 12,8 km või 8 miili sekundis, mis on piisavalt kiire, et sõita ühe minutiga San Franciscost Los Angelesse. Stardust püstitab uue rekordi kõige kiiremini Maale naasnud kosmoseaparaadina, purustades eelmise rekordi, mis püstiti 1969. aasta mail Apollo X-i juhtimismooduli naasemisel. """"""See liigub üle Põhja-California lääneranniku ning teeb taeva valgeks nii California, Kesk-Oregoni, Nevada, Idaho kui ka Utah'i kohal, """" ütles Stardusti projektijuht Tom Duxbury."""
mt: "If the capsule arrives over the U.S. around 5 a.m. Pacific time (12:30 GMT) and enters the atmosphere, residents of Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah could be in for a real light show. The capsule will look a lot like a falling star. The capsule will fly at about 12.8 kilometers per second, which is fast enough to drive from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new record for the fastest return of a spacecraft to Earth, breaking the previous record set in 1969 by the Apollo X command module. """"""It will fly over the Northern California coast and make the sky white over California, Central Oregon, Nevada, Idaho and Utah, """" said Stardust project manager Tom Duxbury."
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Pennsylvania osariigi Pittsburghi lastehaigla arst mõistetakse süüdi tahtlikus tapmises pärast seda, kui tema ema leiti kolmapäeval oma auto pakiruumist surnult, teatavad Ohio ametnikud. Dr Malar Balasubramanian, 29, leiti Ohios Blue Ashist, äärelinnast, mis on umbes 15 miili Cincinnatist põhjapool, tee kõrval maas lamamas T-särgi ja aluspesu väel, ilmselt tugevalt ravimite mõju all. Ta juhatas ohvitserid oma musta Oldsmobile Intrigue'ni, mis oli 500 jalga eemal. Sealt leidsid nad 53-aastase Saroja Balasubramaniani laiba, mis oli kaetud vereplekiliste tekkidega. Politsei ütles, et nähtavasti oli surnukeha olnud seal umbes ühe päeva.
mt: A Pennsylvania pediatrician was charged with murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car, authorities said. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Ohio's Blue Ash, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, on the side of the road lying face down in a T-shirt and sweatpants, apparently under the influence of powerful drugs. She led officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was 500 feet away. From there, they found the body of her 53-year-old mother, Saroja Balasubramanian, wrapped in blood-soaked sheets. Police said the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: See on eBay ajaloo suurim ülesostutehing. Ettevõte loodab mitmekesistada tuluallikaid ja võita populaarsust piirkondades, kus Skype'il on hea positsioon, nagu Hiinas, Ida-Euroopas ja Brasiilias.
mt: This is the largest auction in eBay history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue streams and win popularity in areas where Skype has a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Kui pärast vigasaanute haiglasse transportimist kaklemine lõppes, jäid umbes 40 vangi aeda ja keeldusid kongidesse naasmast. Läbirääkijad üritasid olukorda parandada, kuid vangide nõudmised polnud selged. Kella 22 ja 23 vahel MDT süütasid vangid aias tulekahju. Peagi sisenes aeda politsei rünnakurühm ja ajas kinnipeetavad pisargaasiga nurka. Tuletõrjujad kustutasid lõpuks tule kella 11.35-ks.
mt: 40 inmates were taken to the hospital after a fight broke out. When the inmates were returned to the yard, they refused to go back to their cells. The guards tried to resolve the situation, but the inmates' demands were unclear. At 10:22 and 10:23 MDT, inmates set a fire in the yard. Shortly after, a riot squad entered the yard and used tear gas to subdue the inmates. Firefighters extinguished the fire at 11:35.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: Nende otse-eetris antud kommentaaridega tunnistasid Iraani liidrid esimest korda, et sanktsioonidel on mingi mõju. Need hõlmavad Euroopa Liidu kehtestatud rahalisi piiranguid ja keeldu toornafta eksportimisele, mis moodustab Iraani majanduse jaoks 80% kogu välisriigist saadud tulust. Oma viimases kuuaruandes ütles OPEC, et toornafta eksport oli 2,8 miljoni barreliga päevas langenud kahe kümnendi madalaimale tasemele. Riigi kõrgeim juht ajatolla Ali Khamenei on naftasõltuvust kirjeldanud kui lõksu, mis pärineb ajast enne Iraani islamirevolutsiooni 1979. aastal ja millest riik peaks end vabastama.
mt: In an on-air interview, Iranian officials acknowledged for the first time that sanctions have had some effect. These include European Union-imposed financial restrictions and a ban on exporting crude oil, which makes up 80 percent of the country's total foreign income. In its latest quarterly report, OPEC said crude oil exports had fallen to 2.8 million barrels per day, the lowest level in two decades. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described oil addiction as a trap that dates back to before the Iranian Islamic Revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Nende otse-eetris antud kommentaaridega tunnistasid Iraani liidrid esimest korda, et sanktsioonidel on mingi mõju. Need hõlmavad Euroopa Liidu kehtestatud rahalisi piiranguid ja keeldu toornafta eksportimisele, mis moodustab Iraani majanduse jaoks 80% kogu välisriigist saadud tulust. Oma viimases kuuaruandes ütles OPEC, et toornafta eksport oli 2,8 miljoni barreliga päevas langenud kahe kümnendi madalaimale tasemele.
