src: "Koos nende ametnikega kinnitas ta Texase kodanikele, et avalikkuse kaitsmiseks võetakse vajalikke meetmeid. ""Nimelt ültes Perry: """"Maailmas on vähe paiku, mis oleksid paremini valmistunud, et selle katsumusega toime tulla."""""" Samuti kinnitas kuberner: „Täna saime teada, et mõned kooliealised lapsed on patsiendiga kokku puutunud.” Ta jätkas lausudes, „See juhtum on tõsine. Võite olla kindlad, et meie süsteem toimib nii hästi, kui see toimima peab.”"
mt: "With those officials, he assured Texans that necessary steps are being taken to protect the public. ""Perry said: ""There are few times in the world that are better prepared to handle this kind of event.""""" The governor also assured: "Today we learned that some school-aged children have been exposed to the patient." He continued saying, "This is serious. You can be assured that our system is working as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

""Perry said: ""There are few times in the world that are better prepared to handle this kind of event.""""" The governor also assured: "Today we learned that some school-aged children have been exposed to the patient." He continued saying, "This is serious. You can be assured that our system is working as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Palju aastaid enne The Daily Show’d ja The Colbert Reporti, kui nad olid 1988. aastal UW tudengid, kujutasid Heck ja Johnson ette väljaannet, mis parodeeriks uudiseid ja uudiste edastamist. Onionist pärast selle asutamist saanud tõeline uudiste paroodia impeerium, mille juurde kuulub trükiväljaanne, veebileht, mida vaatas oktoobris 5 000 000 unikaalset külastajat, kuulutusteküljed, ööpäevaringselt toimiv uudistevõrk, taskuhäälingusaated ning hiljuti toodi turule maailma atlas nimega „Meie loll maailm”. Al Gore ja kindral Tommy Franks vuristavad põgusalt ette oma lemmikpealkirjad (Gore’i oma oli see, kui The Onion teatas pärast tema 2000. aasta kaotust valijameeste kogus, et tema ja Tipperi seks oli nende elu parim). Paljud nende ajakirjanikest on avaldanud suurt mõju Jon Stewarti ja Stephen Colbert'i saadetele, milles parodeeritakse uudiseid.
mt: 1988 UW undergraduates Heck and Johnson had previously envisioned a publication that would parody news and the reporting of it. The Onion, after Heck's graduation, became a real news parody empire, which includes a print publication, a website that was visited by 5 million unique visitors in October, billboards, a 24-hour news network, radio reports, and recently released a world atlas called "Our Dumb World." Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have been lampooned for their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported after his 2000 loss that his and Tipper's sex was their best). Many of their writers have had a great influence on Jon Stewart's and Stephen Colbert's news parodies, which lampoon news.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

The Onion, after Heck's graduation, became a real news parody empire, which includes a print publication, a website that was visited by 5 million unique visitors in October, billboards, a 24-hour news network, radio reports, and recently released a world atlas called "Our Dumb World." Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have been lampooned for their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported after his 2000 loss that his and Tipper's sex was their best). Many of their writers have had a great influence on Jon Stewart's and Stephen Colbert's news parodies, which lampoon news.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Protest algas kella 11.00 paiku kohaliku aja järgi (UTC +1) Whitehallis, politsei valvatud sissepääsu vastas, mis viib Downingu tänavale, kus on peaministri ametlik residents. Kohe peale kella 11 blokeerisid meeleavaldajad liikluse Whitehallist põhja suunduval sõidurajal. Kell 11.20 palus politsei protestijatel kõnniteele tagasi liikuda, selgitades, et protestimisõigust on vaja tasakaalustada kuhjuva liiklusega. Kella 11.29 paiku liikus protestimarss mööda Whitehalli ülespoole, möödudes Trafalgari väljakust, mööda Strandi, möödudes Aldwychist ja Kingswayst üles Holborni poole, kus konservatiivne partei pidas oma kevadfoorumit hotelli Grand Connaught ruumides.
mt: 11:00 local time (UTC +1) a protest began on Whitehall, which is guarded by police, in front of the entrance to Downing Street, where the official residence of the prime minister is located. Shortly after 11 o'clock, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound road on Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to return to the sidewalk, explaining that the right to protest must be balanced with the chaos of traffic. At 11:29, the protest march moved up Whitehall, passing Trafalgar Square, passing Strand, passing Aldwych and Kingsway, up to Holborn, where the Conservative Party held its spring forum in the Grand Connaught hotel rooms.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: """""""Meil on nüüd neljakuused diabeedita hiired, kellel oli varem diabeet,"""" lisas ta."" Dr. Ehud Ur, Nova Scotia provintsi pealinnas Halifaxis asuva Dalhousie ülikooli meditsiiniprofessor ja Kanada diabeediühingu kliinilise ning teadusliku osakonna esimees, hoiatas, et uurimustöö on alles varajases algusjärgus. Nagu mõned teisedki eksperdid, on ta skeptiline selle koha pealt, kas diabeeti on võimalik ravida, märkides, et neil leidudel pole mingit tähtsust inimeste jaoks, kellel on juba 1. tüübi diabeet."
mt: """We now have four-legged diabetic mice that previously had diabetes,"""" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and head of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that the research is still in its early stages. Like many other experts, he is skeptical of the significance of the findings for people with type 1 diabetes, noting that the mice have no relevance to humans who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Twin Otter oli püüdnud eile Kokodas PNG lennufirma lennuna CG4684 maanduda, kuid oli korra selle juba katkestanud. Umbes kümme minutit pärast esialgset maandumisaega kadus see teisel lähenemiskatsel. Õnnetuspaik avastati täna ja see on nii ligipääsmatu, et kaks politseinikku saadeti džunglisse, et nad sündmuskohale matkaksid ning ellujäänuid otsiksid. Otsingut takistas seesama halb ilm, mis oli põhjustanud ebaõnnestunud maandumise.
mt: The Twin Otter had attempted to land on the Kokoda PNG Air flight CG4684 yesterday, but had aborted the landing once. About ten minutes after the initial landing attempt, it disappeared on a second approach. The crash site was found today and is so remote that two police officers were sent into the jungle to walk to the site and look for survivors. The same bad weather that caused the failed landing was also hindering the search.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: """""""Õnneks ei juhtunud minuga midagi, kuid ma nägin õudsat stseeni, kuidas inimesid püüdsid väljapääsemiseks aknaid purustada."" Inimesed lõid klaase toolidega, kuid aknad olid purunematud. ""Üks aknaklaas purunes lõpuks ja nad said akna kaudu välja ronida,"""" ütles ellujääja Franciszek Kowal."""
mt: """Fortunately nothing happened to me, but I saw a terrible scene, as people tried to break windows to escape."" People were breaking the windows with tools, but the windows were shattered. ""One window pane broke and they were able to climb out through the window,"""" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."""
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: 2010. aasta Atlanti orkaanihooaja neljas nimetatud torm, troopiline torm Danielle, moodustus Atlandi ookeani idaosas. 3000 miili kaugusel Miamist (Florida) asuva tormi suurim püsiv tuulekiirus on 40 miili tunnis (64 km/h). Riikliku orkaanikeskuse teadlased ennustavad, et Danielle saavutab kolmapäevaks orkaani tugevuse. Kuna torm on rannikust veel kaugel, on keeruline hinnata selle võimalikku mõju Ühendriikidele või Kariibi mere saartele.
mt: 2010 Atlantic hurricane season's fourth named storm, tropical storm Danielle, formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. 3000 miles east of Miami, Florida, the storm's maximum sustained wind speed is 40 mph (64 km/h). National Hurricane Center scientists predict Danielle will reach hurricane strength by Wednesday. Since the storm is still far from the coast, it is difficult to assess its possible impact on the United States or Caribbean islands.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dr Lee väljendas samuti muret teadannete pärast, mille kohaselt on Türgi lapsed nakatunud linnugripi viirusega A(H5N1), ilma et neil oleks avaldunud sümptomeid. Ta märkis, et mõne uuringu kohaselt peab haigus muutuma vähem surmavaks, enne kui see võiks ülemaailmse epideemia põhjustada. Kardetakse, et kui gripi sümptomid jäävad leebeks, nakatavad patsiendid oma igapäevategevusi jätkates rohkem inimesi.
mt: Dr Lee also expressed concern over reports that Turkish children had been infected with the bird flu virus A(H5N1) without showing symptoms. He noted that some studies suggest the disease is becoming less deadly before it could cause a global epidemic. It is feared that if the symptoms become milder, infected patients continuing their daily activities will infect more people.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: 9. augusti öösel asus Morakoti kese umbes seitsmekümne kilomeetri kaugusel Hiina Fujiani provintsist. Hinnangute kohaselt liigub taifuun Hiina poole kiirusel 11 km/h.
mt: 9 August night, Morakoti was about 90 km from Fujian, China. Estimates indicate it is moving towards China at a speed of 11 km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: USA president George W. Bush saabus Singapuri 16. novembri hommikul, alustades nädalast tuuri Aasias. Teda tervitas Singapuri asepeaminister Wong Kan Seng ning ta arutas Singapuri peaministri Lee Hsien Loongiga kaubanduse ja terrorismi küsimusi. Pärast nädalapikkust allajäämist vahevalimistel rääkis Bush ühel esinemisel kaubavahetuse laiendamisest Aasias.
mt: 16 November morning, US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore, starting a week-long tour in Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week-long absence due to the mid-term elections, Bush spoke at one event about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Tänane teadaanne laiendas ka valitsuse selle aasta märtsis võetud kohustust rahastada lisavagunite hankimist. Veel 300 teeb koguarvuks 1300 vagunit, mida on vaja ülerahvastamise leevedamiseks hankida.
mt: Today's announcement also expanded the government's March commitment to fund the purchase of additional railcars.  The total number of cars now stands at 1300, with 300 more needed to be purchased to alleviate overcrowding.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Ta ütles: „Luureandmete kohaselt pole märki, et varsti on oodata rünnakut. Ohutaseme vähendamine tõsisele tasemele ei tähenda, et üldine oht oleks kadunud.”
mt: He said: "There is no indication from intelligence that an attack is imminent. A reduction in the threat level from severe to substantial does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly vannutas eile sisse uue üheksast liikmest koosneva ajutise valimisnõukogu. Tegemist on Martelly viienda Ajutise valimiskoguga (CEP) nelja aasta jooksul. Eelmisel kuul andis presidendi komisjon soovituse eelneva tegevpresidendi tagasiastumiseks osana meetmete paketist viia riik uute valimiste poole. Komisjon oli Martelly vastus oktoobris alanud laiaulatuslikele režiimivastastele protestidele. Kohati vägivaldsete protestide ajendiks oli valimiste korraldamise luhtumine, millest mõnede  toimumist oodati alates 2011. aastast.
mt: On Sunday, Martelly swore in a new nine-member temporary electoral council. This is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month, the president's commission recommended the resignation of the previous acting president as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was the response to the wide-ranging regime protests that began in October. At times, violent protests were sparked by the cancellation of elections, which some were expected to take place since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics toetab Ameerika Ühendriikide olümpiakomitee kirja ja kiidab heaks olümpiapere vajaduse ülendada ohutut keskkonda kõigi sportlaste jaoks. Nõustume USOC-i väitega, et meie sportlaste, klubide ja nende spordi huve teeniks paremini see, kui sertifikaatide äravõtmise asemel toimuks oluline muutus meie organisatsioonis. USA Võimlemisliit toetab sõltumatut uurimist, mis võib päevavalgele tuua selle, kuidas jäi Larry Nassari ohvrite julgelt kirjeldatud väärkohtlemise osakaal nii kauaks märkamatuks, ja võtab omaks mis tahes vajalikud ning asjakohased muudatused. Organisatsioonidel USA Gymnastics ja USOC on sama eesmärk – võimlemise ning muude sportide võimalikult turvaliseks muutmine, et sportlased saaksid oma unistuste poole püüelda ohutus, positiivses ja innustavas keskkonnas.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and agrees with USOC's statement that it is in the best interest of our athletes, clubs and the sport for there to be a meaningful change in our organization, rather than the removal of certificates. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that can bring to light how Larry Nassar's abuse of athletes' trust was allowed to go on for so long, and we will embrace any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and USOC share the same goal – making gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and empowering environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Samuti ütles Ameerika Ühendriikide merevägi, et nad uurivad juhtumit. Samuti ütlesid nad ühes avalduses: „Meeskond teeb parasjagu tööd, et teha kindlaks parim meetod, kuidas laev ohutult välja tõmmata.” Avenger-tüüpi miinitõrjelaev, mis oli teel Palawanis asuvasse Puerto Princesasse. See on määratud USA mereväe seitsmenda laevastiku koosseisu ja asub Jaapanis, Nagasakis Sasebos.
mt: The United States Navy also said it was investigating the incident. In a statement, it said: "The crew is currently working to determine the best method to safely tow the ship." The Avenger-class minesweeper was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the Seventh Fleet and is homeported in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Samuti ütles Ameerika Ühendriikide merevägi, et nad uurivad juhtumit. Samuti ütlesid nad ühes avalduses: „Meeskond teeb parasjagu tööd, et teha kindlaks parim meetod, kuidas laev ohutult välja tõmmata.” Avenger-tüüpi miinitõrjelaev, mis oli teel Palawanis asuvasse Puerto Princesasse. See on määratud USA mereväe seitsmenda laevastiku koosseisu ja asub Jaapanis, Nagasakis Sasebos.
mt: The United States Navy also said it was investigating the incident. In a statement, it said: "The crew is currently working to determine the best method to safely tow the ship." The Avenger-class minesweeper was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the Seventh Fleet and is homeported in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.

src: Pühapäeva õhtul teatas USA president Donald Trump pressisekretäri edastatud avalduses, et USA väed lahkuvad Süüriast. Teadaanne avaldati pärast Trumpi ja Türgi presidendi Recep Tayyip Erdoğani vahelist telefonivestlus. Avalduse kohaselt võtab Türgi üle ka kätte saadud ISISe võitlejate valvamise, kelle kodumaale tagasi toimetamisest Euroopa riigid on keeldunud.
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump announced in a statement released by his press secretary that U.S. forces will be leaving Syria. The statement was released after Trump's phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. The statement said that Turkey will take over the security of the ISIS fighters captured by the U.S., who have been refused repatriation by European countries.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Liitlased ja Afganistani väed liikusid piirkonda tegevuspaika turvama ning abiks on saadetud ka teised liitlaste lennukid. Õnnetus toimus kõrgel mägimaastikul ja arvatakse, et see oli vaenuliku tulevahetuse tagajärg. Õnnetuskoha otsinguid saadavad halb ilm ja karm maastik.
mt: Allies and Afghan forces moved into the area to secure the site, and other allied aircraft were dispatched to assist. The crash occurred in mountainous terrain and it is believed to be the result of hostile fire. Bad weather and rugged terrain are hampering the search for the crash site.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Pärast tammi ehitamist 1963. aastal lõppesid hooajalised üleujutused, mis jõkke setteid paiskasid. See sete oli vajalik selliste liivavallide ja randade loomiseks, mis olid eluslooduse elupaigad. Selle tulemusena on kaks kalaliiki välja surnud ja kaks, sh küür-gilaturbon, on muutunud ohustatuks. Olgugi et veetase tõuseb pärast üleujutust vaid paari jala võrra, loodavad ametnikud, et sellest piisab allvoolul uuristunud liivajoomade taastamiseks.
mt: 1963, after the construction of the dam, seasonal floods ended, which washed the riverbed. This sediment was necessary to form such sandbanks and beaches that were habitats for wildlife. As a result, two fish species have gone extinct and two, including the sturgeon, have become endangered. Despite the fact that the water level rises after the flood only a few feet, officials believe this is enough to restore the eroded sandbars.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: USA saatkond Keenias Nairobis andis välja hoiatuse, et „Somaalia äärmuslased” plaanivad Keenias ja Etioopias alustada enesetapurünnakute korraldamist. USA on enda sõnul saanud avalikustamata allikast teavet, milles konkreetselt mainitakse enesetaputerroristide kasutamist tähtsamate vaatamisväärsuste õhkimiseks Etioopias ja Keenias.
mt: The U.S. embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, issued a warning that "Somali extremists" plan to begin organizing suicide attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers targeting major tourist attractions in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: Nimekad Kreeka advokaadid Sakis Kechagioglou ja George Nikolakopoulos on Ateena Korydalluse vanglas, kuna nad tunnistati süüdi pistise andmises ja korruptsioonis. Selle tulemusena on Kreeka õiguskogukonnas välja kujunenud suur skandaal, mis tugineb viimastel aastatel tehtud kohtunike, juristide, barristeride ja advokaatide ebaseaduslike tegevuste paljastamisele. Mõni nädal tagasi, pärast seda, kui ajakirjanik Makis Triantafylopoulos avaldas oma populaarses Alpha TV telesaates „Zoungla” teavet, astus parlamendi liige ja advokaat Petros Mantouvalos ametist tagasi, kuna tema kabineti liikmed olid seotud ebaseadusliku altkäemaksu ja korruptsiooniga. Lisaks vangistati tippkohtunik  Evangelos Kalousis, sest ta tunnistati süüdi korruptsioonis ja ebamoraalses käitumises.
mt: Notable Greek lawyers Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos are in the Athens Korydallos prison, as they were convicted of bribery and corruption. This has led to a major scandal in the Greek justice system, which is based on the recent exposure of the illegal activities of judges, lawyers, barristers and advocates. A few weeks ago, after journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos revealed information on his popular Alpha TV show "Zoungla", parliament member and advocate Petros Mantouvalos resigned from his post, as his cabinet members were involved in illegal bribery and corruption. In addition, top judge Evangelos Kalousis was imprisoned, as he was convicted of corruption and immoral behavior.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa tegi rivi kõrgeima skoori, 70 jooksu vaid 41 palliga, tabades 11 nelja ja 2 kuute. Keskmise asendi lööjad Sachin Tendulkar ja Rahul Dravid esinesed hästi ja tegid koostöös sada jooksu. Kuid pärast kapteni värava kaotamist tegi India vaid 36 jooksu, kaotades inningute lõpuks seitse väravat.
mt: Robin Uthappa made a run of 70, scoring 41 runs in 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid were in good form and made 100 runs together. But after losing the captain's wicket, India made only 36 runs, losing the match by seven wickets.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Commons projekti juht Adam Cuerden väljendas oma rahulolematust seoses kustutamistega, kui ta eelmisel kuul Wikinewsiga rääkis. """"""Ta [Wales] põhimõtteliselt valetas meile algusest peale. Esiteks käitudes nii, nagu see oleks olnud seaduslikel põhjustel. Teiseks, teeseldes, et ta kuulas meid, ja seda kuni hetkeni, mil ta kunstiteosed kustutas."""""" Ärritunud kogukonna tõttu alustati uue poliitika kavandamist, mis käsitleks seksuaalset sisu miljoneid avatud litsentsiga platvorme hostiva saidi jaoks."
mt: "Commons project lead Adam Cuerden expressed his dissatisfaction with the deletions, as he was speaking to Wikinews last month. """"""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the get-go. First, it was done as if it were legally justified. Second, he pretended to listen to us, and did so until the point he deleted our works."""""" Due to the community's outrage, a new policy was being drafted for the site, which would address sexual content for millions of open-licensed platforms for a single site.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Mitte kõik ei toetanud naiste kategooriate hõlmamist. 2004. aasta olümpia hõbemedalimees Amir Khan ütles: „Sügaval sees mõtlen, et naised ei peaks kaklema. See on minu arvamus.” Vaatamata kommentaaridele ütles ta, et toetab Suurbritannia võistlejaid 2012. aastal Londonis toimuvatel olümpiamängudel.
mt: 2004 Summer Olympics silver medalist Amir Khan said: "Deep down I think women shouldn't fight. That's my opinion." Despite the comments, he said he would support British fighters at the 2012 Summer Olympics in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, 13-aastane mootorrataste võidusõitja, suri pärast õnnetust võidusõidurajal Indianopolis Motor Speedway. Soojendusringil kukkus Lenz ratta pealt maha ja talle sõitis otsa kaasvõistleja Xavier Zayat. Temaga tegeles kohe raja meditsiinipersonal ja ta transporditi kohalikku haiglasse, kus ta hiljem suri. Zayat ei saanud õnnetuses vigastada.
mt: 13-year-old motorcycle racer Peter Lenz died after a crash on the victory lap at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Lenz fell off his bike and was hit by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately treated by track medical personnel and taken to a local hospital, where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the crash.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Lennukiga reisimine võib olla hirmutav kogemus igas vanuses ja mitmesuguse taustaga inimestele, eriti kui see on nende esmane lennusõit või on neil varem olnud traumaatilisi juhtumeid. Seda ei pea häbenema, see ei erine paljudel inimestel esinevatest isiklikest hirmudest ja vastumeelsustest muude asjade vastu. Mõne jaoks võib õhusõidukite tööpõhimõtetest ja lennu ajal toimuvast aru saamine aidata üle saada hirmust, mis põhineb teadmatusel või kontrolli puudumisel.
mt: Flying can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if it is their first flight or if they have had traumatic experiences. This is nothing to be ashamed of, it is no different from the fears and aversions that many people have to other things. For some, understanding the principles of how aircraft work and what happens during a flight can help overcome the fear that is based on ignorance or lack of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Tänapäeval broneeritakse lennureise harva otse lennufirma kaudu ilma enne hindasid üles otsimata ja võrdlemata. Mõnikord võivad erinevate vahendajate juures sama lennu hinnad olla väga erinevad ja tasub võrrelda otsingutulemusi ning vaadata enne broneerimist ka lennufirma enda veebisaiti.
mt: Today, it is rare to book a flight directly through an airline without first comparing and contrasting prices. Sometimes, prices for the same flight can be very different between different agents and it is worth comparing search results and checking the airline's website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Kullerfirmadele makstakse hästi pakkide kiire tarne eest. Sageli on aeg väga oluline äridokumentide, kauba või kiireloomulise remondi jaoks vajalike varuosade puhul. Mõnel marsruudil on suurtel ettevõtetel oma lennukid, kuid teistel marsruutidel ja väiksematel ettevõtetel oli probleeme. Kui asju saadeti õhutranspordiga, võis mõnel marsruudil kuluda päevi mahalaadimisele ja tollikontrolli läbimisele. Ainus viis see kiiremini läbida oli saata see registreeritud pagasina. Lennuettevõtte reeglid ei luba neil pagasit lähetada ilma reisijata, siin tuletegi mängu teie.
mt: Shippers pay well for fast delivery. Often, time is very important for business documents, goods or fast-moving parts and supplies. Some routes have large companies with their own aircraft, but others have problems. When goods were shipped by air, it could take days to clear customs and customs. The only way to get through faster was to send it as a registered package. Airlines' rules do not allow them to send packages without passengers, here comes your game.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Peaksite liidus sageli lendavat lennufirmat hoolsalt valima. Kuigi võite arvata, et on loomulik liituda lennufirmaga, millega kõige enam lendate, peaksite olema teadlik, et teiste sama ühenduse lennufirmade pakutavad eelised on tihtipeale erinevad ja püsikliendi punkte võidakse heldemini jagada.
mt: When choosing a frequent flyer program, it's often tempting to stick with the airline you fly most often. But you should be aware that other airlines in the same alliance may offer different perks and elite status points may be shared among members.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Tarbige alkohoolseid jooke mõõdutundega. Alkohol mõjub igaühele erinevalt, seetõttu on oluline teada oma piiri. Liigse joomise võimalikud pikaajalised tervisekahjustused võivad olla maksakahjustus, kuid isegi pimedaks jäämine ja surm. Oht on isegi suurem, kui tarbitakse ebaseaduslikult toodetud alkoholi. Ebaseaduslik alkohol võib sisaldada mitmesuguseid ohtlikke lisandeid, sealhulgas metanooli, mis võib isegi väikestes annustes põhjustada pimedaks jäämist või surma.
mt: Measure your alcohol intake. Alcohol affects everyone differently, so it is important to know your limits. The possible long-term health effects of excessive drinking can be liver damage, even blindness and death. The risk is even greater if you drink illegally produced alcohol. Illegally produced alcohol may contain various dangerous additives, including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Kanali rajoon (hollandi keeles Grachtengordel) on kuulus 17. sajandi rajoon, mis ümbritseb Amsterdamis Binnenstadi. Kogu piirkond on määratud UNESCO maailmapärandiks oma ainulaadse kultuurilise ja ajaloolise väärtuse tõttu, ning selle kinnisvara hinnad on riigis ühed kõrgemad.
mt: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a famous 17th-century district, which surrounds the inner city of Amsterdam. The entire area has been designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its real estate prices are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km Siem Reapist edela poole. See mägitempel ehitati 9. sajandi lõpus kuningas Yasovarmani valitsusajal. Templi sünge atmosfäär ja Tônlé Sabi järvevaade tasub mäkke ronimise ära. Asukoha külastamise võib mugavalt ühendada paadisõiduga järvele. Templisse sisenemiseks on vaja Angkori passi, nii et ärge unustage Tonle Sapi minnes enda passi kaasa võtta.
mt: 12 km southeast of Siem Reap. This temple was built in the late 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. The dark atmosphere and view of Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the top worthwhile. The site can be reached by boat from the lake. An Angkor pass is required to enter the temple, so don't forget to bring your pass with you when visiting Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarktika on külmim koht Maal ja ümbritseb lõunapoolust. Turismireisid on kallid, eeldavad head füüsilist vormi, toimuvad ainult suvel, novembrist veebruarini, ning piirduvad enamasti poolsaare, saarte ja Rossi merega. Paar tuhat töötajat elavad siin suvel umbes neljas tosinas baasis, mis asuvad enamasti neis piirkondades; vähesed jäävad ka talveks. Antarktika sisemaa on tühi platoo, mida katab 2–3 km jääd. Aeg-ajalt külastavad sisemaad erilennud mägironimise jaoks või poolusele jõudmiseks, kus asub suurem baas.
mt: Antartica is the coldest place on Earth and surrounds the South Pole. Tourism is expensive, requires good physical condition, takes place only in summer, from November to February, and is mostly limited to the Antarctic Peninsula, islands, and the Ross Sea. A few thousand people live here in summer in about four dozen bases, most of which are in these areas; few stay through the winter. Antarctica's interior is a barren plateau covered by 2–3 km of ice. Occasionally, it is visited by mountaineers and explorers to the South Pole, where a larger base is located.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Kaasajale eelsed observatooriumid on tänapäeval tavaliselt vananenud ja jäävad kasutusse muuseumide või õppepaikadena. Kuna nende kõrgajal ei olnud valgusreostus niisugune probleem nagu praegu, asuvad nad tavaliselt linnades või ülikoolilinnakutes ja neile on lihtsam juurde pääseda kui nüüdisajal rajatutele. Enamik kaasaegseid teaduslikke teleskoope on ülisuured rajatised soodsate ilmastikutingimustega kõrvalistes piirkondades.
mt: Early observatories are now typically old and are used as museums or educational sites. Since the light pollution was not such a problem in the past, they are typically located in cities or university towns and are easier to access than modern ones. Most modern scientific telescopes are large facilities in remote areas with good weather.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Kuna Aucklandi piiravad kaks sadamat, on seal palju randu. Kõige populaarsemad neist asuvad kolmes piirkonnas. North Shore'i rannad (North Harbouri piirkonnas) asuvad Vaikses ookeanis ja ulatuvad Long Bay'st (põhjas) kuni Denvonportini (lõunas). Need on peaaegu kõik liivarannad, kus saab ohutult ujuda, ja enamikes pakuvad kõrge raudmürdi puud varju. Tänava Tamaki Drive rannad asuvad Waitemata sadamas, Mission Bay eliitklassi äärelinnades ja Aucklandi keskosas St Heliers’is. Need on perepuhkuseks mõeldud kohati ülerahvastatud rannad, mis on ääristatud hea poodidevalikuga. Ujumine on ohutu.
mt: Because Auckland is surrounded by two harbours, there are many beaches. The most popular are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in the North Harbour area) are in the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay (north) to Devonport (south). They are almost all sandy beaches where you can swim safely, and most have good shade from high cliffs. The Tamaki Drive beaches are in the Waitemata Harbour, in the Mission Bay elite suburb and in the Auckland CBD at St Heliers. They are family-friendly beaches that are sometimes crowded, and are surrounded by a good selection of shops. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Pidage meeles, et külastate sisuliselt massihauda ja et sellel paigal on peaaegu hindamatu tähendus märkimisväärsele osale maailma elanikkonnast. Tänapäevalgi on veel elus mehi ja naisi, kes on siin veedetud aja üle elanud, ning veelgi rohkem on neid, kelle armastatud ligimesed siin tapeti või surnuks töötama sunniti, olid nad siis juudid või mitte. Suhtuge sellesse paika kogu väärikuse, pühalikkuse ja austusega, mida see väärib. Ärge naljatage holokausti ega natside teemal. Ärge rikkuge paika, sodides selle ehitisi markeriga või neid kraapides.
mt: Remember that you are visiting a mass grave and that this place has an incalculable meaning for a significant portion of the world's population. Even today there are still men and women alive who have spent time here, and there are still many more who have loved ones buried here, whether they were Jews or not. Treat this place with all the reverence, sanctity, and respect that it deserves. Do not joke about the Holocaust or the Nazis. Do not desecrate the site by marking its structures with graffiti or defacing them.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Abikeeled on tehiskeeled, mis on loodud selleks, et hõlbustada suhtlust rahvaste vahel, kellel muidu oleks raske suhelda. See erineb lingua francast, loomulikust või orgaanilisest keelest, mis muutub ühel või teisel põhjusel domineerivaks suhtlemisvahendiks erinevaid keeli kõnelevate inimeste vahel.
mt: Artificial languages are constructed languages designed to facilitate communication among peoples who otherwise have difficulty communicating. This differs from a lingua franca, a natural or organic language that becomes dominant as a means of communication among speakers of different languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Kui ületate Läänemere põhjaosa talvel, siis kontrollige, kus teie kajut asub, sest jääst läbisõitmine tekitab lähedalasuvate kajutite jaoks päris tugevat müra. Sankt-Peterburgi kruiisid hõlmavad aega linnas. Kruiisireisijad on vabastatud viisanõuetest (kontrollige tingimusi).
mt: When crossing the Baltic Sea in winter, check where your cabin is located, as passing through ice can create quite a lot of noise for nearby cabins. St. Petersburg cruises include time in the city. Cruise passengers are exempt from visa requirements (check conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Barcelona ametlikud keeled on katalaani ja hispaania keel. Umbes pooled eelistavad katalaani keeles kõneleda, suur enamik saab sellest aru ja praktiliselt kõik oskavad hispaania keelt. Kuid enamik märke on ainult katalaani keeeles, sest seaduse järgi on see esimene ametlik keel. Kuid hispaania keelt kasutatakse laialdaselt ka ühistranspordis ja muudes rajatistes. Metroos edastatakse teateid regulaarselt ainult katalaani keeles, kuid planeerimata häiretest teavitab automatiseeritud süsteem mitmetes erinevates keeltes, sealhulgas hispaania, inglise, prantsuse, araabia ja jaapani keeles.
mt: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About half of the population prefers to speak Catalan, most can understand it, and almost everyone speaks Spanish. Most signs are only in Catalan, as it is the first official language by law. Spanish is widely used in public transport and other facilities. Metro announcements are made only in Catalan, but the automated system for unplanned incidents provides information in several languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Arenenud riikides on tänapäeval luksusliku kodumajutuse pakkumine tõstetud nii-öelda kunstivormiks. Parimad kodumajutused konkureerivad peamiselt kahes põhiasjas: voodipesu ja hommikusöök. Seega võib sellistes peenemates asutustes leida luksuslikke magamisasemeid, näiteks käsitööna valmistatud teki või antiikvoodiga. Hommikusöögiks võidakse pakkuda piirkonna hooajalisi hõrgutisi või võõrustaja erirooga. Asukohaks võib olla vana ajalooline hoone antiikmööbli, hoolitsetud aia ja basseiniga.
mt: In developing countries, the offering of luxury home stays has been elevated to an art form. The best home stays compete primarily in two areas: bed and breakfast and breakfast. So, in such finer establishments, one may find luxurious sleeping accommodations, such as a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may be offered as seasonal local delicacies or the host's specialty. The location may be an old historical building with antique furniture, a well-kept garden, and a pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Arenenud riikides on tänapäeval luksusliku kodumajutuse pakkumine tõstetud nii-öelda kunstivormiks. Parimad kodumajutused konkureerivad peamiselt kahes põhiasjas: voodipesu ja hommikusöök. Seega võib sellistes peenemates asutustes leida luksuslikke magamisasemeid, näiteks käsitööna valmistatud teki või antiikvoodiga. Hommikusöögiks võidakse pakkuda piirkonna hooajalisi hõrgutisi või võõrustaja erirooga. Asukohaks võib olla vana ajalooline hoone antiikmööbli, hoolitsetud aia ja basseiniga.
mt: In developing countries, the offering of luxury home stays has been elevated to an art form. The best home stays compete primarily in two areas: bed and breakfast and breakfast. So, in such finer establishments, one may find luxurious sleeping accommodations, such as a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may be offered as seasonal local delicacies or the host's specialty. The location may be an old historical building with antique furniture, a well-kept garden, and a pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Hiinas asuv Pekingi linn on 2022. aasta taliolümpiamängude toimumiskoht, mis teeb sellest esimese linna, kus on toimunud nii suve- kui ka taliolümpiamängud. Peking korraldab avamis- ja sulgemistseremooniad ning siseruumides toimuvad jääüritused. Teised suusaüritused toimuvad Taizichengi suusapiirkonnas Zhangjiakous, umbes 220 km (140 miili) Pekingist.
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be held in Beijing, China, making it the first city to host both Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the ice events will take place indoors. Other skiing events will take place in the Zhangjiakou Ski Area, about 220 km (140 mi) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Linnugripp või lindude gripp võib nakatada nii linde kui ka imetajaid. Inimestel on teada antud vähem kui tuhandest juhtumist, kuid osa neist lõppes surmaga. Enamik on kaasanud inimesi, kes teevad tööd kodulindudega, kuid seal esineb risk ka linnuvaatlejatele.
mt: Avian influenza or bird flu can infect both birds and mammals. There have been fewer than 1000 human cases reported, but some have ended in death. Most have been people who work with domesticated birds, but there is also a risk to birdwatchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Viikingid kasutasid Venemaa veeteid, et pääseda Mustale ja Kaspia merele. Osa nendest teedest saab endiselt kasutada. Kontrollige, et ei nõutaks erilubasid, mille hankimine võib olla keeruline. Valge mere – Läänemere kanal ühendab Põhja-Jäämere Läänemerega Äänisjärve, Laadoga järve ja Peterburi kaudu peamiselt jõgede ja järvede vahendusel. Onega järv on ühenduses ka Volga jõega, seetõttu on Kaspia merest tulles Venemaa läbimine endiselt võimalik.
mt: The Vikings used the Russian rivers to reach the Black and Caspian Seas. Some of these routes are still in use. Check that you do not need special permits, which may be difficult to obtain. The White Sea – Baltic Canal connects the Northern Sea Route with the Baltic Sea via the Äänisjärvi, Laadoga lake and St. Petersburg mainly through rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is connected to the Volga River, so crossing Russia from the Caspian Sea is still possible.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Lennukilt, laevalt või muult sõidukilt väljumisel on passikontroll tavaliselt esimene peatus. Mõnes piiriüleses rongis viiakse kontrollid läbi liikuvas rongis ja ühte neist rongidest sisenemisel peaks teil olema kaasas kehtiv isikutunnistus. Öistel magamiskupeedega rongidel võivad konduktorid koguda passid, et teie und ei segataks.
mt: When disembarking from a plane, ship, or other conveyance, passport control is usually the first stop. In some border crossings, passport checks are done on moving trains and you should have a valid ID on you when entering one of these trains. Overnight sleeper trains may collect passports from conductors to avoid disturbing you.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Singapur on üldiselt väga ohutu koht, kus olla, ja seal on väga lihtne navigeerida ning sealt saab osta pärast saabumist peaaegu kõike. Kuid asudes kõigest paar kraadi ekvaatorist põhja pool nn kõrgetel troopika laiuskraadidel, peate toime tulema nii kuumusega (kogu aeg) kui ka tugeva päikesekiirgusega (kui taevas on selge, harvemini).
mt: Singapore is generally a very safe place to be, and it is very easy to navigate and you can buy almost anything after you arrive. But being situated just a few degrees north of the equator on the so-called high tropics latitude, you have to deal with both heat (all the time) and strong solar radiation (when the sky is clear, rarely).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Saksamaa küpsetised on päris head ja Baierimaal küllalt rikkalikud ning mitmekesised, sarnanedes lõunanaabri Austria omadele. Puuviljasaiakesed on tavapärased, kusjuures õunu küpsetatakse saiakestesse kogu aasta vältel ning kirsid ja ploomid teevad oma etteaste suvel. Paljudes Saksa pagaritoodetes on ka mandleid, sarapuupähkleid ja muid pähkleid. Populaarsed koogid sobivad sageli hästi tassikese kange kohvi juurde. Kui soovite mõnda kõva külluslikku pagaritoodet, proovige küpsetist, mida olenevalt piirkonnast nimetatakse berlineriks, pfannkucheniks või krapfeniks.
mt: German baked goods are very good and plentiful in Bavaria, similar to its southern neighbor Austria. Fruit pies are common, with apples being baked into pies year round and cherries and peaches making their appearance in the summer. Many German baked goods also contain almonds, chestnuts, and other nuts. Popular cakes often go well with a strong cup of coffee. If you want some hearty sweet baked goods, try the baked goods that are called Berliners, Pfannkuchen, or Krapfen depending on the region.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Kui tahate maailma odavalt näha, seda kas vajaduse, elustiili või väljakutse tõttu, on siin mõned viisid selle saavutamiseks. Põhimõtteliselt jagunevad need kahte kategooriasse: kas töötage reisimise ajal või püüdke oma kulutusi piirata. See artikkel keskendub viimasele. Need, kes on kulutuste peaaegu nullini vähendamise nimel nõus ohverdama mugavust ja aega ning tulema toime ootamatustega, peaksid lugema minimaalse eelarvega reisimise kohta. Nõuanne eeldab seda, et reisijad ei varastaks, ei viibiks seal loata, ei osaleks mustal turul, anuks ega kasutaks muul viisil teisi inimesi omakasu nimel ära.
mt: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for reasons of necessity, lifestyle, or challenge, here are some ways to do it. This article focuses on the latter. Those willing to sacrifice comfort and time to bring their budget to near zero should read about budget travel. The advice assumes that travelers will not steal, will not go where they are not wanted, will not engage in black marketeering, will not beg, and will not otherwise use other people for personal gain.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Lõik Point Marioni ja Fairmonti vahel tutvustab kõige väljakutsuvamaid sõidutingimusi Buffalo-Pittsburghi maanteel, möödudes tihti eraldatud metsatihnikutega maastikest. Kui te pole harjunud külavaheteedel sõitma, siis sõitke tähelepanelikult: järsud kallakud, kitsad teed ja äkilised käänakud on levinud. Kiirusepiirangud on märgatavalt madalamad kui eelmistes ja järgmistes osades – tavaliselt 35–40 miili tunnis (56–64 km/h) – ja nendest rangelt kinni pidamine on veel olulisem kui tavaliselt. Kummalisel kombel on aga mobiilsideteenus siin palju tugevam kui paljudes teistes trassi osades, nt Pennsylvania Wildsis.
mt: The most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Turnpike are between Point Marion and Fairmont, where the road often passes through isolated forested areas. If you're not used to driving on winding roads, drive carefully: sharp curves, narrow roads, and sudden turns are common. Speed limits are significantly lower than in the preceding and following sections – typically 35–40 mph (56–64 km/h) – and adhering to them is even more important than usual. On the other hand, mobile service is much stronger here than in many other sections of the route, such as the Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Canyoning (või canyoneering) on ronimine kanjoni põhja, mis on kas kuiv või vett täis. Kanjonimine (canyoning) ühendab endas ujumise, ronimise ja hüppamise elemente — kuid alaga alustamine eeldab suhteliselt vähe treenimist või füüsilist vormi (võrreldes näiteks mägironimise, sukeldumise või mäesuusatamisega).
mt: C anyoning (or canyoneering) is the sport of descending canyons by negotiating rapids and waterfalls. The sport combines elements of hiking, climbing, rappelling, and swimming, but requires little training or physical fitness (compared to activities such as rock climbing, scuba diving, or downhill skiing).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Oma autosse istumisel ja pikale maanteereisile asumisel on oma lihtsuses loomuomane võlu. Erinevalt suurematest sõidukitest olete ilmselt juba oma auto juhtimisega tuttav ja teate selle kitsaskohti. Telgi ülesseadmine eravaldusesse või mis tahes suuruses linna võib tõmmata kergesti ligi soovimatut tähelepanu. Ühesõnaga on auto ideaalne vahend ringreisiks, kuid harva saab seda ennast kasutada ulualusena. Autoga telkimine on võimalik, kui teil on suur mahtuniversaal, maastur, sedaan või universaal, mille istmeid saab alla lasta.
mt: Sitting in your car and taking a long road trip is a natural act of magic in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are likely already familiar with the handling of your car and know its shortcomings. Placing a tent in the trunk of a car or any size city can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, the car is an ideal vehicle for a road trip, but rarely can it be used as a means of transportation. Car camping is possible if you have a large SUV, SUV, sedan or universal, whose seats can be folded down.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Nüüdisaegse Casablanca linna asutasid berberi kalurid 10. sajandil eKr. Foiniiklased, roomlased ja maroniidid kasutasid seda strateegilise sadamana, mida kutsuti Anfaks. Portugallased hävitasid selle ja ehitasid uuesti üles nimega Casa Branca, kuid hülgasid selle pärast 1755. aasta maavärinat. Maroko sultan ehitas linna uuesti üles Daru I-Badyana ja Hispaania kaupmehed, kes asutasid seal kauplemiskeskused, andsid sellele nime Casablanca Casablanca on üks kõige ebahuvitavamaid kohti ostlemiseks kogu Marokos. Vanas Medinas on lihtne leida kohti, kus müüakse traditsioonilisi Maroko kaupu, nagu taginesid, keraamikat, nahast tooteid, vesipiipe ja tervet rida erinevaid vidinaid, kuid see kõik on vaid turistidele.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC. The Phoenicians, Romans and Mauritanians used it as a strategic port, which was called Anfaks. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it as Casa Branca, but abandoned it after the 1755 earthquake. The Sultan of Morocco rebuilt the city as Daru I-Badyana and Spanish merchants, who established trading centers there, gave it the name Casablanca. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. In the old Medina, it is easy to find places where traditional Moroccan goods are sold, such as tagines, ceramics, leather goods, water pipes and a whole range of different veils, but all of this is only for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Nüüdisaegse Casablanca linna asutasid berberi kalurid 10. sajandil eKr. Foiniiklased, roomlased ja maroniidid kasutasid seda strateegilise sadamana, mida kutsuti Anfaks. Portugallased hävitasid selle ja ehitasid uuesti üles nimega Casa Branca, kuid hülgasid selle pärast 1755. aasta maavärinat. Maroko sultan ehitas linna uuesti üles Daru I-Badyana ja Hispaania kaupmehed, kes asutasid seal kauplemiskeskused, andsid sellele nime Casablanca Casablanca on üks kõige ebahuvitavamaid kohti ostlemiseks kogu Marokos. Vanas Medinas on lihtne leida kohti, kus müüakse traditsioonilisi Maroko kaupu, nagu taginesid, keraamikat, nahast tooteid, vesipiipe ja tervet rida erinevaid vidinaid, kuid see kõik on vaid turistidele.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC. The Phoenicians, Romans and Mauritanians used it as a strategic port, which was called Anfaks. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it as Casa Branca, but abandoned it after the 1755 earthquake. The Sultan of Morocco rebuilt the city as Daru I-Badyana and Spanish merchants, who established trading centers there, gave it the name Casablanca. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. In the old Medina, it is easy to find places where traditional Moroccan goods are sold, such as tagines, ceramics, leather goods, water pipes and a whole range of different veils, but all of this is only for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Põhjapoole jääb lihtsasti ligipääsetav romantiline ja võluv väikelinn Sintra, mis sai välismaalaste seas tuntuks pärast seda, kui Lord Byron selle võlusid hiilgavalt kirjeldas. Scotturb buss nr 403 sõidab sageli Sintrasse ja peatub teel Cabo da Rocas. Põhja pool külastage ka Fatima Jumalaema pühamut (pühakoda), mis on üle maailma kuulus Neitsi Maarja ilmutuste kohana.
mt: To the north is the easily accessible romantic and beautiful small town of Sintra, which became famous among foreigners after Lord Byron described its charms so vividly. Scotturb bus number 403 often goes to Sintra and stops on the way at Cabo da Roca. To the north, also visit the Fatima Shrine of Our Lady (church), which is famous around the world as a site of apparitions of the Virgin Mary.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: 1994. aastal pidas Mägi-Karbahhi piirkond, mis on etniliselt armeenlastega asustatud, aserite vastu sõda. Armeenia toetusega loodi uus vabariik. Küll aga ei tunnusta seda ametlikult ükski olemasolev riik, isegi mitte Armeenia. Diplomaatilised vaidlused piirkonna üle kahjustavad jätkuvalt Armeenia ja Aserbaidžaani vahelisi suhteid.
mt: 1994, the Karabakh region, which is ethnically Armenian, held a referendum on secession. However, no other country recognizes the new state, not even Armenia. Diplomatic disputes over the region continue to damage Armenia and Azerbaijan's relations.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Põhja-Carolinas asuva Charlotte'i linna üheks tugevaks küljeks on see, et seal on arvukalt kvaliteetseid võimalusi peredele. Teistest piirkondadest pärit perekonnad nimetavad siiakolimise peamiseks põhjuseks peresõbralikkust ja külastajad leiavad tihtipeale, et linn on lastega koos nauditav ajaveetmise koht. Viimase 20. aasta jooksul on lastesõbralike võimaluste kogus Charlotte’i äärelinnas järsult tõusnud. Charlotte’is ei kasuta perekonnad üldiselt taksosid, ehkki teatud olukordades võivad need vajalikuks osutuda. Rohkem kui 2 reisija korral tuleb maksta lisatasu, mistõttu võib see valik olla vajalikust kallim.
mt: One of the strongest points of the city of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that there are many quality options for families. Families from other areas of the state call the city a family-friendly destination. In the last 20 years, the number of family-friendly options in the Charlotte suburbs has skyrocketed. Families in Charlotte do not usually use taxis, but in certain situations they may be necessary. More than two people per taxi requires an additional fee, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Enne kui hispaanlased 16. sajandil saabusid, oli Tšiili põhjaosa inkade võimu all, samal ajal kui põlised araukaanid (Mapuche hõimud) elasid Tšiili kesk- ja lõunaosas. Maputšed olid samuti ühed viimased iseseisvad Ameerika põlismaalased, kes ei sulandunud Hispaaniakeelse võimuga täielikult enne Tšiili iseseisvuse saavutamist. Ehkki Tšiili kuulutas iseseisvuse välja 1810. aastal (keset Napoleoni sõdu, mis jätsid Hispaania paariks aastaks ilma toimiva keskvalitsuseta), saavutati otsustav võit hispaanlaste üle alles 1818. aastal.
mt: 16th century, the north of Chile was under the Inca Empire, while the original Araucanians (Mapuche tribes) lived in the central and southern parts of Chile. The Mapuches were also one of the last independent American indigenous peoples who did not fully integrate with Spanish rule before the independence of Chile was achieved. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (during the Napoleonic Wars, which left Spain without a functioning central government for a few years), the decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, mis tähendab 'viit maad', hõlmab Liguria nimelises Itaalia piirkonnas asuvat viit väikest rannikuküla: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza ja Monterosso. Need on kantud UNESCO maailmapärandi nimistusse. Sajandite jooksul on inimesed hoolikalt ehitanud astanguid järskude nõlvadega maastikule, mis viivad kaljude tippu, kust avaneb vaade merele. Osa selle võlust on ettevõtete nähtava arendustegevuse puudumine. Teed, rongid ja laevad ühendavad külasid ning autod ei pääse nendele väljast juurde.
mt: Cinque Terre, which means "five lands", comprises five small coastal villages in the Liguria region of Italy: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso. They have been included in the UNESCO World Heritage List. For centuries, people have carefully built stairways on the steep cliffs of the landscape, which lead to the tops of the rocks, from which there is a view of the sea. Part of this beauty is the absence of visible development by businesses. Roads, trains and boats connect the villages and cars cannot access them from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
