src: Machu Picchu põhjapoolse otsa kohal kõrgub see järsk mägi, mis on tihti paljude varemetest tehtud fotode taustaks. Altpoolt näib see pisut hirmuäratavana ning tõus tippu on järsk ja keeruline, kuid enamik normaalses füüsilises vormis inimesi peaksid suutma selle läbida umbes 45 minutiga. Enamik rajast on kaetud kivist astmetega ja järsemad kohad on varustatud trossidest käetugedega. Sellegipoolest eeldage, et see võtab teid võhmale, ja olge järsemates osades ettevaatlik, eriti kui on märg, sest sel juhul võib see muutuda kiiresti ohtlikuks. Tipu lähedal on väike koobas, millest tuleb läib minna; see on küllalt madal ja üpris kitsas.
mt: This steep mountain, often the backdrop for photos of many of the ruins, appears a bit daunting from below, and the climb to the top is steep and challenging, but most people in normal physical condition should be able to do it in about 45 minutes. Most of the trail is paved with stone steps and the steeper sections are equipped with handrails made of ropes. Nevertheless, expect to get sweaty, and be cautious on the steeper sections, especially if it's wet, as it can become slippery quickly. Near the top is a small cave that you have to crawl through; it's low and very narrow.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Mallorca toidud, nagu sarnased Vahemereäärsed toidud, põhinevad saial, köögiviljadel ja lihal (eriti sealihal) ning nendes kasutatakse palju oliiviõli. Eriti suvel on lihtsaks armastatud õhtusöögiks Pa amb Oli: leib oliiviõli, tomati ja muude saadaolevate lisanditega nagu juust, tuunikala jne.
mt: Mallorcan cuisine, like other Mediterranean cuisines, is based on olive oil, vegetables, and meat (especially local meat) and uses a lot of olive oil. Especially in the summer, it is a popular evening meal to have Pa amb Oli: bread with olive oil, tomatoes, and other available additions such as cheese, tuna, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Hangi toitu küpsetatakse maa sees olevas kuumas augus. Auku soojendatakse kas tulest võetud kuumade kividega või mõnes kohas kuumutab maasoojus teatud alasid looduslikult. Hangit kasutatakse tihti selleks, et küpsetada traditsiooniline grillitud õhtusöök. Rotoruas pakuvad mitmed kohad geotermilisi hangisid, samas kui teisi hangisid saab proovida Christchurchis, Wellingtonis ja mujal.
mt: Food is cooked in a hot pit dug into the ground. The pit is heated with hot rocks taken from a fire or in some places the geothermal heat warms up certain areas naturally. Rotorua offers many geothermal hot pools, while others can be tried in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Kloostreid külastades peavad naised kandma põlvi katvaid seelikuid ja ka nende õlad peavad kaetud olema. Enamik kloostreid küll pakuvad ettevalmistumata naistele kehakatteid, aga kui teil on midagi endal kaasas, eriti kui see on erksavärviline, siis sissepääsu juures olev munk või nunn naeratab teile. Samamoodi peavad mehed kandma pükse, mis katavad põlvi. Ka seda saab sissepääsu juures laenutada, kuid riideeset ei pesta pärast igat kasutajat, nii et nende seelikute kandmine ei pruugi olla meeldiv. Meeste puhul sobib kõigile üks suurus!
mt: When visiting a monastery, women must wear skirts that cover the knees and their legs must be covered. Most monasteries offer unprepared women robes, but if you have something of your own, especially if it is bright, the monk or nun at the entrance will laugh at you. Similarly, men must wear trousers that cover the knees. This can also be borrowed at the entrance, but the robes are not cleaned after each user, so their wearing may not be pleasant. For men, one size fits all!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Kui külastate Arktika või Antarktika piirkondi talvel, kogete polaarööd, mis tähendab, et päike ei tõuse horisondist kõrgemale. See annab hea võimaluse näha virmalisi, kuna taevas on pime pea ööpäev läbi. Kuna need piirkonnad on hõredalt asustatud ja seega esineb valgusreostuse probleemi nende puhul harva, on seal võimalik ka tähti nautida.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic in winter, you will experience polar nights, which means the sun does not rise above the horizon. This gives a good opportunity to see auroras, as the sky is dark all day. Since these regions are sparsely populated and therefore the light pollution problem rarely occurs, it is possible to enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Kõrvalistes asukohtades, kus pole mobiililevi, võib satelliittelefon olla teie ainus võimalus. Satelliittelefon ei asenda tavaliselt mobiiltelefoni, kuna telefonikõne tegemiseks peate olema väljas, satelliidi segamatus vaateväljas. Teenust kasutab tihti laevandus, sh lõbusõidulaev, aga ka ekspeditsioonid, mis vajavad kaugandmeid ja häält. Selle teenusega ühenduse loomise kohta peaks suutma rohkem teavet anda teie kohalik telefoniteenuse pakkuja.
mt: In areas without cell coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone does not usually replace a cell phone, as you must be outside, in a clear view of the satellite, to make a call. This service is often used by cruise ships, including ferries, but also by expeditions that need remote data and voice. For more information on setting up a connection, you should be able to get more information from your local cell service provider.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Moldova pealinn on Chişinău. Kohalik keel on rumeenia keel, kuid palju kasutatakse ka vene keelt. Moldova on paljurahvuseline vabariik, mis on kannatanud etnilise konflikti all. 1994. aastal viis see konflikt Ida-Moldovas isehakanud Transnistria Vabariigi loomiseni, millel on omaenda valitsus ja valuuta, kuid mida ükski ÜRO liikmesriik ei ole tunnustanud. Majanduslikud seosed on uuesti taastatud Moldova kahe osa vahel vaatamata ebaõnnestumistele poliitilistes läbirääkimistes. Moldova põhiusk on õigeusu kristlus.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but many use Russian as well. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic, which has its own government and currency, but which is not recognized by any UN member state. Economic ties have been reestablished between the two parts of Moldova despite failures in political negotiations. The main religion of Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Kuna Montevideo asub ekvaatorist lõuna pool, on seal suvi siis kui põhjapoolkeral on talv, ja vastupidi. Montevideo asub lähistroopikas; suvekuudel on üle +30 °C temperatuurid tavapärased. Talv võib olla petlikult jahe: temperatuurid langevad harva alla nulli, kuid tuul ja niiskus koos tekitavad külmema tunde, kui termomeetril näidatud on. Ei ole konkreetseid vihmaseid või kuivi aastaaegu: vihma hulk püsib terve aasta umbes sama.
mt: Because Montevideo is south of the equator, its summer is when it is winter in the Northern Hemisphere, and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; summer temperatures above 30 °C are common. Winter can be deceptive: temperatures rarely fall below zero, but wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than the thermometer indicates. There are no distinct wet or dry seasons: rainfall remains about the same throughout the year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: Soovimatud seinamaalid ja kritseldused on tuntud grafitina. Kuigi see pole kaugeltki tänapäevane nähtus, seostavad paljud inimesed seda tõenäoliselt noortega, kes pihustivärvidega avalikke ja eraomandeid rikuvad. Kuid tänapäeval on olemas grafitikunstnikud ja -üritused ning legaalsed grafitiseinad. Selles kontekstis meenutavad grafitijoonistused sageli rohkem kunstiteoseid kui ebaseaduslikke märgiseid.
mt: Unwanted graffiti and tagging are known as graffiti. Although this is not a modern phenomenon, many people associate it with young people who deface public and private property with spray paints. However, today there are graffiti artists and events and legal graffiti walls. In this context, graffiti drawings often resemble more works of art than illegal markings.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Mõne muusikafestivali puhul otsustab enamik osaosalejaid kohapeal telkida ja peab seda väga tähtsaks osaks sellest kogemusest. Kui tahate möllu lähedal olla, peate te varakult kohale minema, et saada telkimiskoht muusika lähedale. Pidage meeles, et kuigi pealavadel ei pruugita enam muusikat mängida, siis festivalil võib olla teisi lavasid, kus mängitakse kuni hiliste õhtutundideni. Mõnel festivalil on spetsiaalsed laagriplatsid, mis on mõeldud väikeste lastega peredele.
mt: At some music festivals, most campers choose to camp on site and consider this an important part of the experience. If you want to be near the main stage, you need to get there early to get a campsite near the main stage. Remember that even though the main stage is no longer playing music, there may be other stages playing music until late at night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Arvestades seda, kui kaugel asuvad paljud pueblod suurest asustusest, ei leia te erilist ööelu ilma Albuquerque’i või Santa Fesse sõitmata. Siiski, peaaegu kõik eespool loetletud kasiinod serveerivad jooke ja mitmed neist toovad sisse tuntud kaubamärgiga meelelahutust (peamiselt suuremad, mis asuvad Albuquerque ja Santa Fe vahetus ümbruses). Ettevaatust: siinsed väikelinnabaarid ei ole alati mujalt tulnud külastajatele sobivad ajaveetmispaigad. Muuhulgas on New Mexico osariigi põhjaosas suuri probleeme joobes juhtimisega ja joobes juhtide kontsentratsioon on väikelinnade baaride lähedal kõrge.
mt: Given how far many pueblos are from the major population centers, you're unlikely to find much nightlife in Albuquerque or Santa Fe without driving. However, most of the casinos listed above serve alcohol and some of the larger ones bring in well-known entertainment (mostly in the Albuquerque and Santa Fe area). Note that these small-town bars are not always the best places to meet people for drinks. In particular, the northern part of the state has a serious problem with drunk driving and the concentration of drunk drivers is high in small-town bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Peamine kohalik õlu on Number One, mille maitse pole mitte kompleksne, vaid meeldiv ja värskendav. Teise kohaliku õlle nimi on Manta. Prantsuse veine võib olla palju, kuid Uus-Meremaa ja Austraalia veinid võivad reisimiseks sobilikumad olla. Kohalik kraanivesi on joomiseks täiesti sobilik, aga kui kardate, siis on kerge leida ka pudelivett. Austraallaste jaoks on „flat white” kohv võõras mõiste. „Short black” on espresso, cappuccino't aga serveeritakse kuhja kreemiga (mitte vahuga) ja teed pakutakse ilma piimata. Kuum šokolaad vastab Belgia standarditele. Puuviljamahlad on kallid, aga suurepärased.
mt: The main local beer is Number One, whose taste is not complex, but pleasant and refreshing. The second local beer is Manta. French wines can be plenty, but New Zealand and Australian wines may be more suitable for travel. Local tap water is perfectly drinkable, but if you are afraid, it is easy to find bottled water. For Australians, "flat white" is a foreign concept. "Short black" is espresso, cappuccino is served with cream (not with milk) and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive, but excellent.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Guarani põlisrahvas oli kõige märkimisväärsem pärismaalaste rühm, kes asustasid tänase Ida-Paraguay alasid ja elasid pooleldi rändava eluviisiga küttidena, kes harrastasid äraelamiseks ka põllumajandust. Chaco piirkond oli koduks teistele põlishõimude rühmadele, nagu Guaycurú ja Payaguá, mis jäid ellu tänu jahipidamisele, korilusele ning kalapüügile. 16. sajandil sündis hispaanlastest vallutajate ja põlisasukate kohtumise tulemusena Paraguay, mida varem kutsuti Indiate hiidprovintsiks. Hispaanlased alustasid kolonisatsiooniperioodi, mis kestis kolm sajandit. Alates Asuncióni asutamisest 1537. aastal on Paraguay suutnud säilitada suure osa selle pärismaisest olemusest.
mt: The Guarani were the largest indigenous group to inhabit the present-day Eastern Paraguay and lived a semi-nomadic hunter-gatherer lifestyle, supplemented by some agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other indigenous groups, such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering, and fishing. The result of the encounter between the Spanish conquerors and the indigenous peoples was the creation of Paraguay, formerly known as the "Great Province of the Indies". The Spanish began a colonization period that lasted three centuries. Since the founding of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to preserve much of its indigenous character.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: Levinud on arvamus, et Pariislased on enesekesksed, ülbed ja ennast täis. Ehkki see on sageli vaid ebatäpne stereotüüp, on parim viis Pariisis toimetulekuks siiski võimalikult viisakalt käituda, pidades end ülal nagu „bien élevé” (hea kasvatusega) inimene. See muudab ringiliikumise oluliselt lihtsamaks. Pariislaste rohmakas suhtumine kaob kiiresti, kui näitate üles elementaarset viisakust.
mt: A common belief is that Parisians are arrogant, haughty and self-important. While this is often just an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to survive in Paris is to be as polite as possible, as if you were a "bien élevé" (well-bred) person. This makes getting around much easier. Parisians' prickly attitude quickly disappears when you show them basic politeness.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRailil on Cape Towni ja selle lähialade lähisõidurongides kaks sõiduklassi: MetroPlus (kustutakse ka Esimeseks klassiks) ning Metro (kutsutakse Kolmandaks klassiks). MetroPlus on mugavam ja seal on vähem rahvast, kuid see on veidi kallim, kuigi siiski odavam tavalistest Euroopa metroopiletitest. Igal rongil on nii MetroPlus kui ka Metro vagunid. MetroPlusi vagunid on alati selle rongi lõpus, mis on Kaplinnale kõige lähemal.
mt: MetroRail in Cape Town and its surrounding areas has two classes of service: MetroPlus (which is being phased out and replaced by First Class) and Metro (which is being phased out and replaced by Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and has fewer passengers, but is slightly more expensive, but still cheaper than typical European metro tickets. Each train has both MetroPlus and Metro cars. MetroPlus cars are always at the end of the train, which is closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Reisijad võivad leida loomakahjureid, mida nende kodupiirkonnas ei tunta. Kahjurid võivad rikkuda toitu, põhjustada ärritust või halvemal juhul tekitada allergilisi reaktsioone, levitada mürki või kanda edasi nakkusi. Nakkushaigused ise või ohtlikud loomad, kes võivad inimesi jõuga vigastada või tappa, ei liigitu tavaliselt kahjurite alla.
mt: Travelers may encounter pests that are not found in their home region. Pests can contaminate food, cause irritation, or in the worst case trigger allergic reactions, spread toxins, or carry diseases. Diseases themselves or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people are not usually classified as pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Igas nurgapoes on segadust tekitav valik kõnekaarte, mida saab kasutada taksofonides või tavapärastes telefonides. Kuigi enamikuga kaartidest saab helistada igale poole, pakuvad mõned soodustariife helistamiseks teatud rühma kuuluvatesse riikidesse. Juurdepääs nendele teenustele on tihti tasuta telefoninumbri kaudu, millele saab enamikelt telefonidelt tasuta helistada.
mt: Each corner of the phone has a confusing array of calling cards, which can be used in taxis or in regular phones. While most of the cards allow you to call anywhere, some offer discounts for calling certain groups of countries. Access to these services is often free by calling a toll-free number, which can be dialed for free from most phones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Plitvice järvede rahvuspark on kaetud tihedate metsadega, põhiliselt pöökide, kuuskede ja nulgedega, ning seal kasvab mägi- ja vahemeretaimestike segu. Seal on tänu oma erinevatele mikrokliimadele, muldadele ja altituudidele märkimisväärselt lai taimeliikide mitmekesisus. Piirkond on ka koduks äärmiselt mitmekesisele looma- ja linnuliikide kogumile. Siit võib peale paljude levinud liikide leida ka haruldasi loomi, nagu Euroopa pruunkaru, hunt, kotkas, öökull, ilves, metskass ja metsis
mt: Plitvice Lakes National Park is covered by dense forests, mainly beech, fir and spruce, and is home to a rich variety of mountain and lowland plant species. The area is also home to a remarkable diversity of animal and bird species. In addition to many common species, it is possible to find rare animals such as the brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, deer, wild boar, lynx, otter, and wildcat.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Meediaettevõtted, kes väidavad, et selle eesmärk on piraatluse ennetamine, valetavad regulaarselt. Tegelikult ei mõjuta piirkonnakoodid ebaseaduslikku kopeerimist absoluutselt; ketta bitt-bitile koopia mängib kõikidel seadmetel sama hästi nagu originaalgi. Tegelik eesmärk on anda nendele ettevõtetele suurem kontroll oma turgude üle; see kõik on kasumi tootmise heaks.
mt: Media companies that claim this is to prevent piracy are lying.  Region codes do not absolutely prevent unauthorized copying; a bit-for-bit copy plays on all devices just as well as the original.  The real goal is to give these companies more control over their markets; all of this is for the sake of profit.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Samas, kui immigratsiooni kontrollpunktid tavaliselt puuduvad või on lihtsalt formaalsused, kui saabute oma koduriiki, võib tollikontroll olla tüliks. Kontrollige, mida võite sisse tuua ja mida mitte, ning deklareerige kõik, mis ületab seadusliku piirangu.
mt: However, when immigration checkpoints are absent or are merely formalities, when you can bring your own country, customs control can be a hassle. Check what you can bring in and what not, and declare all that exceeds the legal limit.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Cochamo orus, Tšiili peamises ronimissihtkohas, mida tuntakse Lõuna-Ameerika Yosemite nime all, on mitmesuguseid graniidist suuri kaljumüüre ja kaljurünkaid. Mäeharjade tippudelt avanevad hingematvad vaated. Mägironijad kõikjalt maailmast rajavad pidevalt uusi radu selle lõputu potentsiaaliga kaljuseinadel.
mt: Cochamó Mountain, Chile's main climbing destination, known as the South American Yosemite, is a place of many large granite cliffs and buttresses. The peaks offer breathtaking views. Climbers from around the world continue to establish new routes on the seemingly endless granite walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Kui soovite ümber maailma lennata ainult mööda lõunapoolkera, siis on lendude ja sihtkohtade osas valik piiratud transatlantiliste lendude vähesuse tõttu. Ükski lennuettevõtjate ühendus ei võimalda kõiki kolme ookeaniületust lõunapoolkeral (ja SkyTeam ei hõlma ühtegi ületamist). Star Alliance hõlmab aga kõike, välja arvatud Vaikse ookeani lõunaosa Santiago de chile'ist Tahitini, mis on LATAM Oneworldi lend. See lend pole ainus valik, kui soovite vältida Vaikse ookeani lõunaosa ja Lõuna-Ameerika läänerannikut. (vt allpool)
mt: If you want to circumnavigate the globe only south of the equator, your choices are limited by the scarcity of transatlantic flights. No airline alliance covers all three oceans south of the equator (and SkyTeam doesn't cover any of them). Star Alliance covers all of them, except for the southern part of the Pacific Ocean from Santiago de chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This is not the only option if you want to avoid the southern part of the Pacific Ocean and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Rahvusvaheliselt on seal peaaegu 200 töötavat reisikorraldajat. Enamik neist tegutsevad iseseisvalt. Ülemaailmsete jooksutuuride eelkäija Go Running Tours ühendab mitmeid vaatamisväärsuste jooksutuuride pakkujaid neljal mandril. Saanud alguse Barcelona jooksutuurist Running Tours Barcelona ja Kopenhaageni jooksutuurist Running Copenhagen, liitusid sellega peagi Praha Running Tours Prague ning teised.
mt: There are almost 200 tour operators in the world. Most of them operate independently. The precursor of the international running tours, Go Running Tours, brings together many providers of sightseeing running tours on four continents. Having started with the Running Tours Barcelona in Barcelona and the Running Copenhagen in Copenhagen, it was soon joined by the Running Tours Prague in Prague and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Aafrika suurimaks turismimagnetiks on arvatavasti safarid, mis on paljudele külalistele reisi tipphetkeks. Populaarselt kasutatav mõiste „safari” viitab maismaareisidele eesmärgiga avastada Aafrika elusloodust, eriti savanne. Mõned loomad, nagu elevandid ja kaelkirjakud, tulevad autode lähedale ja nende vaatlemiseks piisab standardvarustusest. Lõvid, gepardid ja leopardid on mõnikord arad ja neid on lihtsam näha binokliga. ""Safari jalutuskäik (inglise keeles viidatakse sellele veel väljenditega """"bush walk"""", """"hiking safari"""" või """"footing"""") koosneb matkast, mis on kas paari tunni või mitme päeva pikkune."""
mt: "Africa's largest tourist magnet is probably safaris, which are a trip of a lifetime for many visitors. The popular term "safari" refers to land tours to explore Africa's wildlife, especially in savannas. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, come close to cars and can be seen with standard equipment. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes dangerous and are easier to see with binoculars. ""Safari walk (the term is also referred to as ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"" or ""footing"") consists of a tour that is either a few hours or several days long."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Tuurid on odavamad suurtele gruppidele, mistõttu, kui reisite üksi või vaid ühe sõbraga, üritage tutvusi leida ja moodustage neljast kuni kuuest inimesest koosnev grupp, et saada paremat hinda. See ei peaks aga tegelikult teile muret valmistama, sest sageli tõstetakse turiste autode täitmiseks ringi. Tegelikult näib see pigem viisina petta inimesi uskuma, et nad peavad rohkem maksma.
mt: Tours are cheaper for large groups, so if you are traveling alone or with just one friend, try to find some people to travel with and form a group of four to six people to get a better price. This shouldn't make you worry, as often tourists are charged more for car rentals. It seems more like a way to trick people into believing they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Tuurid on odavamad suurtele gruppidele, mistõttu, kui reisite üksi või vaid ühe sõbraga, üritage tutvusi leida ja moodustage neljast kuni kuuest inimesest koosnev grupp, et saada paremat hinda. See ei peaks aga tegelikult teile muret valmistama, sest sageli tõstetakse turiste autode täitmiseks ringi. Tegelikult näib see pigem viisina petta inimesi uskuma, et nad peavad rohkem maksma.
mt: Tours are cheaper for large groups, so if you are traveling alone or with just one friend, try to find some people to travel with and form a group of four to six people to get a better price. This shouldn't make you worry, as often tourists are charged more for car rentals. It seems more like a way to trick people into believing they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Samal ajal kui San Fransisco majandus on seotud sellega, et see on maailmatasemel turismisihtkoht, on selle majandus mitmekesine. Suurimad tööhõivesektorid on professionaalsed teenused, valitsus, rahandus, kaubandus ja turism. Sagedane kujutamine muusikas, filmides, kirjanduses ja populaarkultuuris on aidanud muuta linna ja selle vaatamisväärsused kogu maailmas tuntuks. San Fransisco on arendanud suure turismi infrastruktuuri, mis hõlmab rohkelt hotelle, restorane ja esmaklassilisi San Francisco on ka teiste Aasia köökide jaoks üks parimaid kohti: Korea, Tai, India ja Jaapani.
mt: While San Francisco's economy is tied to its status as a world-class tourist destination, its economy is diverse. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, retail and tourism. Frequent depiction in music, film, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known worldwide. San Francisco has developed a large tourism infrastructure, including many hotels, restaurants and upscale San Francisco is also one of the best places for other Asian cuisines: Korean, Thai, Indian and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Ette broneerimine annab reisijale meelerahu, et tal on sihtkohta jõudes magamiskoht olemas. Reisibüroodel on tihti lepingud konkreetsete hotellidega, kuid võite reisibüroo kaudu leida teisi majutuse võimalusi, näiteks laagriplatse. Reisibürood pakuvad tavaliselt pakette, mis sisaldavad hommikusööki, transporti lennujaama/lennujaamast või isegi lennu ja hotelli kombineeritud pakette. Samuti võivad nad teie broneeringut hoida, kui soovite pakkumise üle järele mõelda või hankida sihtkoha jaoks muid dokumente (nt viisat). Mis tahes muudatusi ja taotlusi tuleks esmalt arutada reisikorraldajaga mitte otse hotelliga.
mt: Booking in advance gives the traveler peace of mind that a place to stay will be available upon arrival at the destination. Travel agencies often have contracts with specific hotels, but you can also find other accommodation options, such as camping sites. Travel agencies usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation to/from the airport or airport/hotel combined packages. They may also keep your booking if you want to review the offer or obtain other documents (e.g. visa) for the destination. Any changes and requests should be discussed with the travel agency, not directly with the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Reaalajas teksti tõlkimise rakendused – rakendused, mis suudavad automaatselt tõlkida terveid tekstilõike ühest keelest teise. Osa selle kategooria rakendusi suudavad isegi tõlkida võõrkeelseid tekste märkideks või muudeks pärismaailma objektideks, kui kasutaja oma nutitelefoni nende objektide poole suunab. Tõlkemootorid on muljetavaldavalt paremaks muutunud ja annavad sageli enam-vähem õigeid tõlkeid (ja harvem täielikku jama), kuid teatav hoolsus on vajalik, kuna tõlge võib valeks osutuda. Selle kategooria üks silmapaistvamaid rakendusi on Google Translate, mis võimaldab pärast soovitud keeleandmete allalaadimist võrguühenduseta tõlkimist.
mt: Real-time translation apps – apps that can automatically translate entire blocks of text from one language to another. Some apps in this category can even translate foreign text into symbols or other real-world objects, if the user points their phone's camera at those objects. Translation engines have gotten much better and often give reasonably good translations (and sometimes complete gibberish), but some care is required, as the translation may be wrong. One of the most notable apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language packs.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Laviinid ei ole ebatavalised; järskudele nõlvadele mahub vaid teatud hulk lund ja üleliigne lumi tuleb laviinidena alla. Probleem on selles, et lumi on kleepuv, nii et selle allatulemiseks on vaja tõuget, ning vahel võib alla liikuv lumi vallandada ülejäänud massiivi. Vahel on algseks käivitavaks sündmuseks see, kui päike soojendab lund, vahel suuremad lumesajud, vahel muud looduslikud sündmused ja tihti inimene.
mt: Avalanches are not uncommon; only a certain amount of snow can accumulate on steep slopes. The problem is that the snow is sticky, so it takes a lot of snow to avalanche. Sometimes the initial trigger is the sun warming the snow, sometimes larger snowfalls, sometimes other natural events, and often the human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Karri on roog, mis põhineb ürtidel ja vürtsidel koos kas liha või köögiviljadega. Karri võib olenevalt vedelikukogusest olla kuiv või vedel. Põhja-India ja Pakistani sisemaapiirkondades kasutatakse jogurtit sageli karrides; Lõuna-Indias ja mõnes muus poolsaare rannikupiirkonnas kasutatakse üldjuhul kookospiima.
mt: Curry is a dish made with spices and vegetables or meat. Curry can be dry or wet depending on the amount of liquid. In the northern Indian and Pakistani interior regions, yogurt is often used in curries; in southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is usually used instead.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Lõunapooluse traavers (või maantee) on 1600 km rada Rossi mere kaldal asuvast McMurdo jaamast pooluseni. See moodustub kokkupressitud lumest, mille praod on täidetud, ja on tähistatud lippudega. Sellel saab sõita ainult spetsiaalsete traktoritega, mis veavad kütuse ja varustusega kelke. Need ei ole väga väledad, seega peab rada tegema pika pöörde transantarktiliste mägede ümber, et jõuda platoole.
mt: The South Pole Traverse (or Road) is a 1600 km road from the McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea coast to the South Pole. It is made of compacted snow, which is filled with pipes, and is marked with flags. It can only be driven by special tractors, which tow fuel and supply sleds. They are not very fast, so the road has to be made around the Transantarctic Mountains to reach the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Autoga Lõuna-Aafrikasse reisimine pakub hämmastavat võimalust näha kogu piirkonna ilu ning pääseda kohtadesse, mis asuvad tavapärastest turismimarsruutidest eemal. Hoolikalt planeerides saab seda teha tavalise autoga, kuid 4x4 on väga soovitatav ja paljudesse kohtadesse pääseb ainult kõrge kliirensiga neljarattaveolisega. Plaanimisel pidage meeles, et kuigi Lõuna-Aafrika on stabiilne, pole seda kõik naaberriigid. Viisa nõuded ja hind erinevad riigiti ning neid mõjutab riik, millest tulete. Igas riigis kehtivad ka ainulaadsed seadused, mis määravad kindlaks, millised hädaabikomplektid peavad autodes olema.
mt: 4x4s are highly recommended and in some places only high clearance 4x4s will get you there. Plan ahead and be aware that while South Africa is stable, not all of its neighbors are. Visa requirements and costs vary by country and are affected by the country you are coming from. Each country has its own unique laws that dictate what safety equipment must be in your vehicle.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Asjade kandmisega aitamine – ärge kunagi laske oma kotte silmist, eriti kui ületate rahvusvahelisi piire. Võite avastada, et teid on enese teadmata narkootikumide vedajana kasutatud ja see võib teile suuri pahandusi kaasa tuua. See sisaldab järjekorras ootamist, sest igal ajal võidakse ilma etteteatamata kasutada narkokoeri. Mõnes riigis kohaldatakse isegi esmakordsete rikkumiste korral äärmiselt karme karistusi; selleks võib olla üle 10-aastane vanglakaristus või surmanuhtlus. Järelevalveta pagas võib langeda varguse ohvriks, samuti võib see tõmmata endale ametkondade tähelepanu, kelle ülesandeks on vältida pommiohtu.
mt: 1. Don't ever let your bags out of your sight, especially when crossing international borders. You may find that you are unknowingly used as a drug mule and this can bring you great trouble. This includes waiting in line, as at any time a drug dog may be used without warning. In some countries, even first time offenders can face very harsh punishments; this could be over 10 years in prison or the death penalty. Unattended luggage can fall victim to theft, as well as bring unwanted attention from authorities whose job it is to prevent bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Täida oma kodu hommikul küllusliku kohvilõhna ja õhtul lõõgastava kummeliteega. Kui olete kodu lähedal puhkusel, on teil aega ennast kostitada ja võtta mõned lisaminutid, et valmistada midagi erilist. Kui teis on rohkem seiklushimu, kasutage võimalust mahla valmistamiseks või mõne smuuti segamiseks: ehk avastate lihtsa joogi, mida saate endale hommikusöögiks valmistada, kui oma igapäevase rutiini juurde naasete. Kui elate linnas, mille joogikultuur on mitmekesine, külastage baare või pubisid naabruskondades, kus te sageli ei käi.
mt: Fill your home in the morning with the rich aroma of coffee and in the evening with the relaxing scent of incense. If you are on vacation nearby, you have time to pamper yourself and take a few extra minutes to prepare something special. If you have more of an adventurous spirit, take advantage of the opportunity to make a simple drink that you can make for breakfast when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a diverse coffee culture, visit bars or pubs in neighborhoods where you rarely go.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

Kui elate linnas, mille joogikultuur on mitmekesine, külastage baare või pubisid naabruskondades, kus te sageli ei käi.
mt: Fill your home in the morning with the rich aroma of coffee and in the evening with the relaxing scent of incense. If you are on vacation nearby, you have time to pamper yourself and take a few extra minutes to prepare something special. If you have more of an adventurous spirit, take advantage of the opportunity to make a simple drink that you can make for breakfast when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a diverse coffee culture, visit bars or pubs in neighborhoods where you rarely go.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Haldarsvíki külast avaneb vaade lähedal asuvale Eysturoy saarele ja siin asub haruldane kaheksanurkne kirik. Kirikuaias on mõnede haudade kohal huvitavad marmorist tuvide skulptuurid. Tasub võtta pool tundi oma ajast, et selles huvitavas linnas ringi konnata.
mt: From Haldarsvík, there is a view of the nearby island of Eysturoy, and here is a rare octagonal church. There are some interesting marble tomb sculptures on the church grounds. It is worth taking half an hour of your time to walk around this interesting town.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Kuigi teil ei ole turismi või äri eesmärgil teatud riike lühiajaliselt külastades vaja viisat, on teil rahvusvahelise tudengina sinna minnes vaja pikemat viibmist kui siis, kui lähete ainult turistina. Üldjuhul nõutakse mis tahes riigis pikaajaliselt viibimiseks eelnevat viisa taotlemist. Üldjuhul on õppeviisade nõudmised ja taotlemisprotsess tavapärase turisti- või äriviisa taotlemisest erinev. Enamiku riikide puhul on teil vaja vastuvõtukirja asutusest, kus õppida soovite, ja tõendit, et teil on piisavalt rahalisi vahendeid oma õpingute toetamiseks vähemalt esimese õppeaasta jooksul. Üksikasjalikku teavet nõuete kohta küsige asutuselt, kuhu soovite õppima minna, ja selle riigi sisserändeametilt.
mt: Even though you do not need a visa for tourism or business purposes to visit certain countries for a short period of time, you will need a visa for longer stays as a student. In most cases, you will need to apply for a visa in advance for any country you plan to stay in for a longer period of time. In most cases, the requirements and application process for a student visa will be different from that of a tourist or business visa. In most cases, you will need a letter of acceptance from the institution you wish to study at, and proof that you have sufficient funds to support your studies for at least the first academic year. For more detailed information on the requirements, contact the institution you wish to study at, and the immigration office of the country you plan to visit.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Eriti just suvel peate erilist tähelepanu pöörama sääskedele, kui otsustate vihmametsas matkata. Isegi kui sõiduki uks on sõites läbi subtroopilise vihmametsa paar sekundit lahti, piisab sellest, et moskiitod saaksid teie juurde sõidukisse.
mt: Especially in the summer, you should pay special attention to mosquitoes when you decide to hike in the rainforest. Even if the car door is open for a few seconds while driving through the sub-tropical rainforest, it is enough for mosquitoes to get into your car.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarbans on maailma suurim rannikuäärne mangroovivöö, mis ulatub rannikust 80 km (50 miili) kaugusele Bangladeshi ja India sisemaale. Sundarbans on kantud UNESCO maailmapärandi nimistusse. India territooriumile jäävat osa metsast nimetatakse Sundarbansi rahvuspargiks. Metsad ei ole siiski ainult mangroovipuude sood – sinna kuuluvad mõned viimased allesjäänud võimsad džunglid, mis kunagi Gangese madalikku katsid. Sundarbansi pindala on 3850 km², millest umbes ühte kolmandikku katab vesi või sooalad. Alates 1966. aastast on Sundarbans olnud ka looduskaitseala ning hinnanguliselt elab piirkonnas praegu 400 bengalitiigrit ja umbes 30 000 tähnikhirve.
mt: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, spanning 10,000 km² (3,900 sq mi) along the coast of Bangladesh and India. The Sundarbans is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Indian part of the forest is called Sundarbans National Park. The forest is not only mangrove swamps – it also contains some of the last remaining wild forests that once covered the Ganges Delta. The Sundarbans covers an area of 5,400 km² (2,100 sq mi), of which about one-third is covered by water or swamps. Since 1966, the Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary and is home to about 400 Bengal tigers and 30,000 spotted deer.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Maailmas on üle 5000 erineva keele, sealhulgas räägib enam kui kahtekümmend keelt 50 miljonit või rohkem inimest. Samuti on kirjapandud sõnadest tihtipeale lihtsam aru saada kui kõneldud sõnadest. See kehtib eriti aadresside puhul, mida on raske arusaadavalt hääldada. Paljud rahvad kõnelevad inglise keelt täiesti soravalt, ja veelgi rohkemate rahvaste puhul võib oodata piiratud oskusi, eelkõige noorema elanikkonna seas. Kujutagem ette, et manchesterlane, bostonlane, jamaikalane ja Sydney elanik istuvad Toronto restoranis õhtusöögilaua taga. Nad lahutasid teineteise meelt lugudega oma kodukohast, jutustades neid oma erinevate aktsentidega ja kohalikus slängis.
mt: 5000 different languages are spoken in the world, with more than 50 million people speaking each of them. Also, it is often easier to understand written words than spoken words. This is especially true for place names, which are often difficult to pronounce. Many people speak English fluently, and even more people have limited skills, especially among younger generations. Imagine a man from Manchester, Boston, Jamaica, and Sydney sitting at a restaurant in Toronto for dinner. They communicate with each other by telling stories about their hometowns, each with their own accent and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Bussid väljuvad sisepiirkonna bussijaamast (üle jõe) kogu päeva jooksul, kuigi enamik, eriti need, mis sõidavad itta ja Jakari/Bumthangi, väljuvad 6.30 ja 7.30 vahel. Kuna linnaosadevahelised bussid on tihti täis, on soovitav osta pilet paar päeva varem valmis. Enamikke piirkondi teenindavad väikesed Jaapani rannasõidubussid, mis on mugavad ja tugevad. Jagatud taksod on kiire ja mugav viis sõita lähedalasuvatesse kohtadesse, näiteks Parosse (150 Nu) ning Punakhasse (200 Nu).
mt: Buses leave from the inner city bus station (across the river) all day, though most, especially those going south and to Jakar/Bumthang, leave between 6:30 and 7:30. Since city-to-city buses are often full, it is advisable to buy a ticket a few days in advance. Most areas are served by small Japanese minivans, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and convenient way to get to nearby places, such as Paro (150 Nu) and Punakha (200 Nu).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Koosmõjus selle võrdlemisi raske ligipääsetavusega on Timbuktud hakatud kasutama eksootiliste, kaugete paikade metafoorina. Timbuktu on vaesunud linn, olgugi et selle kuulsus teeb sellest vaatamisväärsuse ja seal on lennujaam. Aastal 1990 lisati see kõrbeliivade ohu tõttu ohustatud maailmapärandi nimekirja. See oli üks olulisemaid peatusi Henry Louis Gatesi PBS-i erisaates „Aafrika maailma imed”. Võrreldes teiste riigi linnadega, on see täiesti teistsugune, kuna sellel on pigem araabia kui aafrika hõng.
mt: The combination of its relative inaccessibility makes Timbuktu a metaphor for exotic, faraway places. Timbuktu is a poor town, despite its fame, and it has an airport. In 1990 it was added to the World Heritage List of sites in danger due to sandstorms. It was one of the most important stops in Henry Louis Gates' PBS special "Wonders of the African World". Compared to other towns in the country, it is very different, as it has more of an Arab than an African feel.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Paraolümpia toimub 24. augustist 5. septembrini 2021. Osa üritustest toimuvad Jaapani teistes paikades. Tokyost, kus toimusid 1964. aasta mängud, saab ainus Aasia linn, kus olümpiamängud on toimunud kaks korda. Kui broneerisite lennud ja majutuse 2020. aastaks enne, kui edasilükkamisest teada anti, võite olla keerulises olukorras. Tühistamisreeglid on erinevad, kuid märtsi lõpu seisuga ei laiene enamik koroonaviirusel põhinevaid tühistamisreegleid 2020. aasta juulikuusse, mil pidid toimuma olümpiamängud. Eeldatavasti jääb enamiku piletite hind vahemikku 2500 ¥ ja 13 0000 ¥ ning tavapärased piletid maksavad umbes 7000 ¥.
mt: 2021 Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held in other places in Japan. Tokyo, where the 1964 games were held, will be the only Asian city to have hosted the Olympics twice. If you booked flights and accommodation for 2020 before it was postponed, you may be in a difficult situation. Cancellation rules vary, but as of the end of March, most coronavirus-related cancellation rules do not extend beyond July 2020, when the Olympics were supposed to be held. Most tickets are expected to be in the range of 2500 yen and 13,000 yen, and regular tickets are expected to cost about 7000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Tornaado on väga madala rõhuga pöörleva õhu sammas, mis imeb ümbritsevat õhku sisse ja ülespoole. Tornaado tekitab tugevat tuult (sageli 100-200 miili/tunnis) ja suudab tõsta õhku raskeid esemeid, kandes neid mööda oma liikumisteekonda. Nad saavad alguse tormipilvedest tekkivate lehtritena ja muutuvad tornaadodeks, kui  maad puutuvad.
mt: A tornado is a low-pressure rotating column of air that sucks in surrounding air and rises upward. Tornadoes create strong winds (often 100-200 miles per hour) and can lift heavy objects, carrying them along its path. They begin as funnel clouds in thunderstorms and become tornadoes when they touch the ground.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Kui teie külastatava riigi kohta kehtivad reisisoovitused, võib see mõjutada teie reisi tervisekindlustust või reisitõrkekindlustust. Võib-olla soovite te enda oma asemel mõne muu valitsusega nõu pidada, kuid nende nõuanded on mõeldud sealsete kodanike jaoks. Ühe näitena võivad Ameerika kodanikud eurooplaste või araablastega võrreldes seista Lähis-idas silmitsi teistsuguste olukordadega. Riigi reisinõuanded on kõigest lühike kokkuvõte ühe riigi poliitilisest olukorrast. Esitatud vaated on sageli pealiskaudsed, üldistatud ja liigselt lihtsustatud, võrreldes mujal saadaval oleva üksikasjalikuma teabega.
mt: If travel advisories are in effect for your destination country, your travel medical insurance or trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may want to consult with another government's travel advisory, but their advice is intended for their citizens and may not be applicable to you. For example, Americans may find themselves in a different situation in the Middle East than Europeans or Arabs. Travel advisories are just a brief summary of a country's political situation. The views expressed are often superficial, generalized, and overly simplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Kui teie külastatava riigi kohta kehtivad reisisoovitused, võib see mõjutada teie reisi tervisekindlustust või reisitõrkekindlustust. Võib-olla soovite te enda oma asemel mõne muu valitsusega nõu pidada, kuid nende nõuanded on mõeldud sealsete kodanike jaoks. Ühe näitena võivad Ameerika kodanikud eurooplaste või araablastega võrreldes seista Lähis-idas silmitsi teistsuguste olukordadega. Riigi reisinõuanded on kõigest lühike kokkuvõte ühe riigi poliitilisest olukorrast. Esitatud vaated on sageli pealiskaudsed, üldistatud ja liigselt lihtsustatud, võrreldes mujal saadaval oleva üksikasjalikuma teabega.
mt: If travel advisories are in effect for your destination country, your travel medical insurance or trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may want to consult with another government's travel advisory, but their advice is intended for their citizens and may not be applicable to you. For example, Americans may find themselves in a different situation in the Middle East than Europeans or Arabs. Travel advisories are just a brief summary of a country's political situation. The views expressed are often superficial, generalized, and overly simplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Reisibürood on olnud olemas juba 19. sajandist. Reisikorraldaja on tavaliselt hea valik teekonna jaoks, mis ulatub kaugemale reisija eelnevast kogemusest seoses looduse, kultuuri, keele või madala sissetulekuga riikidega. Kuigi suurem osa agentuure on valmis võtma vastu enamikku tavapärastest broneeringutest, siis paljud agendid spetsialiseeruvad üksnes konkreetsetele reisitüüpidele, eelarve vahemikele või sihtkohtadele. Parem on kasutada resikorraldajat, kes broneerib sageli teie reisile sarnaseid reise. Vaadake veebisaidilt või vaateaknalt, milliseid reise agent reklaamib.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good choice for a trip that goes beyond your previous experience in terms of nature, culture, language, or low-income countries. While most agents are willing to take most of the bookings, some agents specialize in only certain types of trips, price ranges, or destinations. It is better to use an agent who books similar trips to yours. Look at the website or the window of the agent, what kind of trips the agent advertises.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: On palju asju, mida arvesse võtta enne kuhugile reisimist ja reisimise ajal. Reisides võtke arvesse, et asjad ei ole nii nagu kodus. Kombed, seadused, toit, liiklus, majutus, standardid, keel jms erineb mingil määral sellest, kus te elate. Seda pead sa alati meeles pidama, et vältida pettumusi ja isegi vastikust selle vastu, kuidas kohalikud asju teevad.
mt: There are many things to consider before and during travel. When traveling, remember that things are not the same as at home. Customs, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language, etc. differ in some way from where you live. Always keep this in mind to avoid disappointments and even anger at how locals do things.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Kui reisite esimest korda arengumaadesse – või uude maailmajaosse – ärge alahinnake potentsiaalset kultuurišokki. Mitmed stabiilsed ja võimekad reisijad on saanud jagu uudsusest, mis on tekkinud arenevas maailmas reisimisse, kus mitmed väikesed kultuurilised kohandused võivad üksteisega kiiresti liituda. Aklimatiseerumise hõlbustamiseks mõelge esimestel päevadel raha laristamise peale läänelikes hotellides, läänelikule toidule ja teenustele. Ärge magage maas madratsil või polstril piirkonnas, kus te ei tea kohalikku faunat. Kui te plaanite telgis ööbida, võtke kaasa välivoodi või võrkkiik, et end madude, skorpionite ja muude selliste olendite eest kaitsta.
mt: If you're traveling to developing countries for the first time, don't undervalue the potential culture shock. Many stable and capable travelers have fallen victim to the novelty of travel in developing countries, where many small cultural adjustments can quickly compound. To ease acclimation, consider spending your first few days in Western hotels, eating Western food and using Western services. Don't sleep on the floor or couch in a region where you don't know the local fauna. If you plan to sleep in a tent, bring a mosquito net or hammock to protect yourself from bugs, snakes, and other such creatures.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Tehke oma poliisist ja kindlustusandja kontaktandmetest koopiad ning kandke neid endaga kaasas. Nõu saamiseks / volitamiseks ja nõuete esitamiseks, peavad nad näitama kindlustaja e-posti aadressi ja rahvusvahelisi telefoninumbreid. Hoidke veel ühte koopiat oma pagasis ja veebis (saatke endale manusega meil või talletage seda pilves). Kui reisite süle- või tahvelarvutiga, siis talletage koopia selle kettale või mälukaardile (juurdepääsetav ilma internetita). Samuti andke poliisi/kontaktide koopiad reisikaaslastele ja sugulastele või sõpradele, kes on kodumaal ja on valmis aitama.
mt: Make copies of your insurance and emergency contact information and carry them with you. To request or authorize assistance, they must show the insurer's email address and international phone numbers. Keep one copy in your wallet and online (send yourself a copy with a reminder or save it in the cloud). If you travel with a laptop or tablet, save a copy to the drive or memory card (accessible without internet). Also give copies of your contact information to your travel companions and family members who are at home and are willing to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Aastate jooksul on kasutatud mitmeid erinevaid filmiformaate. Standardne 35 mm film (36 x 24 mm negatiiv) on kõige levinum. Kui see otsa saab, on seda tavaliselt võimalik täiendada küllaltki hõlpsasti, ning see tagab resolutsiooni, mis on laias laastus võrreldav praeguse DSLR-iga. Mõnes keskformaat filmikaameras kasutatakse 6 korda 6 cm formaati, täpsemalt negatiivi mõõtmetega 56 korda 56 mm. See annab peaaegu neli korda suurema resolutsiooni kui 35 mm negatiiv (3136 mm2 versus 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 x 24 mm negative) is the most common. If it runs out, it can be easily supplemented, and it provides a resolution comparable to a DSLR. In some medium format film cameras, 6x6 cm format is used, more precisely the negative size of 56x56 mm. This gives about four times the resolution of 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Lihtsaim viis alustada reisikirjade äriga on lihvida oma oskusi reisiblogijana mõnel veebisaidil. Kui tunnete end veebis vormindamises ja redigeerimises mugavalt, võite hiljem luua omaenda veebilehe.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel blog is to start writing on someone else's website. If you feel comfortable with the web formating and editing, you can later create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Lihtsaim viis alustada reisikirjade äriga on lihvida oma oskusi reisiblogijana mõnel veebisaidil. Kui tunnete end veebis vormindamises ja redigeerimises mugavalt, võite hiljem luua omaenda veebilehe.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel blog is to start writing on someone else's website. If you feel comfortable with the web formating and editing, you can later create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Kodus on pideva kokkupuute tõttu kohalike pisikutega väga suur tõenäosus, et olete nende vastu juba immuunne. Kuid teistes maailma paikades, kus bakterifauna on teie jaoks uus, tekib teil palju tõenäolisemalt probleeme. Samuti kasvavad bakterid soojemates kliimades kiiremini ning püsivad väljaspool keha kauem elus. Nii tekivad nuhtlused nagu Delhi kõhuhäda, vaarao needus, Montezuma kättemaks ja nende paljud sõbrad. Nagu hingamisprobleemid külmemates kliimades, on seedehäired soojemates kliimades tavapärased ja enamasti on need pigem tüütud kui ohtlikud.
mt: At home, you are likely to be immune to the bacteria you encounter daily. In other parts of the world, where the bacteria are new to you, you are more likely to have problems. Bacteria grow faster in warmer climates and survive longer outside the body. Thus, diseases like Delhi belly, dysentery, Montezuma's revenge, and their many friends are common. Like respiratory problems in colder climates, digestive problems in warmer climates are common and usually harmless.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
