src: Euroopa on suhteliselt väike mander, millel on siiski palju iseseisvaid riike. Tavaliselt tähendab mitmest riigist läbisõitmine seda, et mitu korda tuleb taotleda viisat ja läbida passikontrolli. Kuid selles küsimuses toimib Schengeni tsoon mõneti nagu üks riik. Nii kaua, kui jääte selle tsooni piiresse, on teil põhimõtteliselt võimalik ületada piire nii, et te ei lähe uuesti läbi passikontrollpunktide. Kui teil on Schengeni viisa, ei pea te taotlema viisat igasse Schengeni liikmesriiki eraldi, säästes seeläbi aega, raha ja paberimajandust.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent with many independent countries. Usually, crossing several countries means going through several border controls and passport checks. However, in the Schengen area, it works somewhat like one country. As long as you stay within the Schengen area, you can cross borders without going through passport controls again. If you have a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a visa to each Schengen country separately, saving time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Tutankhamuni haud (KV62). KV62 võib olla oru kõige kuulsam haud, noore kuninga peaegu puutumata kuninglik matmispaik, mille avasas 1922. aastal Howard Carter. Enamiku teiste kuninglike haudadega võrreldes on Tutankhamuni haud siiski vaevalt külastamist väärt, sest on palju väiksem ja väheste kaunistustega. Kõik, kes tahavad näha tõestust kahjustustest, mis muumiale tehti, kui seda kirstust eemaldada üritati, peavad pettuma, sest näha on üksnes pea ja õlad. Hauakambri vaimustavad aarded ei ole enam selle sees, vaid need on viidud Kairos asuvasse Egiptuse muuseumi. Külastajatel, kellel on aega piiratult, oleks parem oma aega mujal veeta.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous tomb in the Valley of the Kings, the young king's almost intact royal burial place, which was opened in 1922 by Howard Carter. Compared to most other royal tombs, Tutankhamun's tomb is relatively small and unadorned. Anyone who wants to see evidence of damage done to the mummy when it was removed from the coffin will be disappointed, as all that is visible is the head and shoulders. The tomb's spectacular treasures are no longer in it, but are in the Cairo Museum. Visitors with limited time would be better off spending it elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Boweni saar on populaarne ühepäevareisi või nädalavahetuse sihtkoht, kus saab kajakiga sõita, matkata, kaupluseid ja restorane külastada ning palju muud. See ehe kogukond asub Howe Soundis Vancouveri lähedal ja sinna pääseb hõlpsalt Vancouveri kesklinnast Granville’i saarelt väljuvate graafiku alusel liiklevate veetaksodega. Nende jaoks, kes naudivad õues tegutsemist, on matk Sea to Sky (merest taevani) koridorist üles hädavajalik. Whistler (1,5 tunnise sõidu kaugusel Vancouverist) on kallis, kuid 2010. aasta taliolümpiamängude tõttu tuntud. Talvel nautige ühte parimat suusatamiskogemust Põhja-Ameerikas ja suvel proovige ehtsat mägijalgrattasõitu.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular one-day trip or weekend destination where you can kayak, hike, shop, and eat. This tight-knit community is located in Howe Sound near Vancouver and can be easily reached from downtown Vancouver via the Granville Island ferries. For those who enjoy being outdoors, the Sea to Sky (from sea to sky) corridor is a must. Whistler (a 1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive, but is known for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy one of the best skiing experiences in North America and in the summer, try the exhilarating mountain bike ride.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Boweni saar on populaarne ühepäevareisi või nädalavahetuse sihtkoht, kus saab kajakiga sõita, matkata, kaupluseid ja restorane külastada ning palju muud. See ehe kogukond asub Howe Soundis Vancouveri lähedal ja sinna pääseb hõlpsalt Vancouveri kesklinnast Granville’i saarelt väljuvate graafiku alusel liiklevate veetaksodega. Nende jaoks, kes naudivad õues tegutsemist, on matk Sea to Sky (merest taevani) koridorist üles hädavajalik. Whistler (1,5 tunnise sõidu kaugusel Vancouverist) on kallis, kuid 2010. aasta taliolümpiamängude tõttu tuntud. Talvel nautige ühte parimat suusatamiskogemust Põhja-Ameerikas ja suvel proovige ehtsat mägijalgrattasõitu.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular one-day trip or weekend destination where you can kayak, hike, shop, and eat. This tight-knit community is located in Howe Sound near Vancouver and can be easily reached from downtown Vancouver via the Granville Island ferries. For those who enjoy being outdoors, the Sea to Sky (from sea to sky) corridor is a must. Whistler (a 1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive, but is known for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy one of the best skiing experiences in North America and in the summer, try the exhilarating mountain bike ride.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria joaks nimetatakse linna Zimbabwe lääneosas, üle piiri on Livingstone Sambias ja lähedal asub Botswana. Linn asub täpselt joa kõrval, mis on peamine vaatamisväärsus, kuid see populaarne sihtkoht pakub nii seiklushimulistele kui ka vaatamisväärsuste huvilistele piisavalt valikuid pikemaks ajaks. Vihmaperioodil (novembrist märtsini) on vett rohkem ja juga on uhkem. Te saate kindlasti märjaks, kui ületate silla või kõnnite mööda radasid, mis kulgevad jugade lähedal. Teiselt poolt on teie vaade kosele varjatud kogu selle vee poolt, sest vee kogus on nii suur.
mt: Victoria Falls is a city in west Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia and near Botswana. The city is situated on the Zambezi River and the Victoria Falls themselves. The falls are popular with tourists from all over the world. The rainy season is from November to March and the falls are at their most impressive then. You will get wet crossing the bridge or walking along the paths near the falls. On the other side you have a view of the mist covered gorge as the water is so great.
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Tavalise fotograafia reeglid kehtivad ka video salvestamisele, võib-olla isegi rohkemki veel. Kui millegi pildistamine pole lubatud, siis ei tohiks te isegi mõelda selle filmimisest. Kui kasutate drooni, kontrollige enne, mida teil on lubatud filmida ja milliseid lubasid või lisalitsentse nõutakse. Drooni lennutamine lennujaama lähedal või rahvahulga kohal on peaaegu alati halb mõte, isegi kui see teie piirkonnas ebaseaduslik ei ole.
mt: The rules of photography also apply to video recording, perhaps even more so. If filming something is not allowed, you should not even think about filming it. If you use a drone, check before filming what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licenses are required. Flying a drone near an airport or a crowd of people is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Viisamenetluse täiendavaks nõudeks on registreerimine. Mõnedes riikides peate kohalike ametivõimude juures registreerima oma kohalolu ja aadressi, kus viibite. Selle tõttu või olla vaja täita ankeet kohalikus politseijaoskonnas või külastada immigratsiooniametnikku. Mitmes sellise seadusega riigis tegelevad registeerimisega kohalikud hotellid (küsige kindlasti üle). Muudel juhtudel peavad registreeruma ainult need, kes ei ööbi majutusettevõtetes. Kuid see muudab seaduse palju ebamäärasemaks, nii tasub see eelnevalt selgeks teha.
mt: 5. Registering. In some countries, you must register your presence and address with local authorities. As a result, you may be required to fill out a form at the local police station or visit an immigration official. In countries with such laws, local hotels (ask for it) will register for you. Otherwise, only those staying in hotels must register. However, this makes the law much more ambiguous, so it is best to clarify this beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Reisimise ajal vabatahtliku töö tegemine on suurepärane viis maailma paremaks muuta, kuid asi pole ainult andmises. Elamine ja vabatahtlik töö võõral maal on hea viis õppida tundma teistsugust kultuuri, kohata inimesi, iseenda kohta teada saada, õppida nägema asju õiges perspektiivis ja isegi omandada uusi oskusi. See võib olla hea viis, kuidas oma eelarve täiendamisega kusagile kauemaks jääda, kuna paljude vabatahtlike tööde jaoks pakutakse majutust ja sööki ning mõne puhul makstakse isegi veidi palka.
mt: Volunteering while traveling is a great way to make the world a better place, but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering abroad is a great way to experience a different culture, meet people, learn about yourself, see things in a new perspective, and even gain new skills. It can be a great way to extend your budget, as many volunteer opportunities offer free accommodation and food, and in some cases even pay a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Walt Disney maailma reisimine on paljude Ameerika perekondade jaoks justkui oluline palverännak. Tavapärane külastus hõlmab lendu Orlando rahvusvahelisse lennujaama, bussisõitu kohapealse Disney hotelli juurde, umbes nädalast viibimist üksnes Disney valdustes ja naasemist koju. Võimalikke variante on lõputult, kuid enamik inimesi peab Disney Worldi minekust rääkides silmas just seda. Palju pileteid, mida müüakse veebis oksjonilehtede, nagu eBay või Craigslisti kaudu, on osaliselt kasutatud mitmepäevased pargihüppajate piletid. Kuigi piletite edasi andmine on väga levinud, on Disney selle tegevuse keelanud: piletid ei ole edasi antavad.
mt: A trip to Walt Disney World is like a pilgrimage for many American families. A typical visit includes a flight to Orlando's international airport, a bus ride to a Disney hotel, a week spent in Disney parks, and a return home. There are countless variations, but most people think of this when they talk about going to Disney World. Many tickets, sold on online auction sites like eBay or Craigslist, are partially used multi-day park hopper tickets. While ticket reselling is common, Disney has prohibited this activity: tickets are not transferable.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Kõik, kes plaanivad reisi riiki, mida võib pidada sõjatsooniks, peaks läbima professionaalse koolituse. Internetiotsing vaenuliku keskkonna kursuse kohta annab tõenäoliselt tulemuseks kohaliku ettevõtte aadressi. Kursusel käsitletakse harilikult siin arutatud probleeme palju üksikasjalikumalt, tavaliselt koos praktilise kogemusega. Kursus kestab tavaliselt 3–5 päeva ja sisaldab rollimängu, palju esmaabi ja vahel ka relvatreeningut. Metsiku looduse jätkusuutlikkust käsitlevad raamatud ja ajakirjad on tavapärased, kuid sõjatsoone käsitlevaid väljaandeid on vähe.
mt: Anyone planning to travel to a war zone should undergo professional training. A search for a course on hostile environments will likely yield a local company's address. The course typically covers the issues discussed here in much greater detail, often with practical experience. The course usually lasts 3–5 days and includes role-playing, first aid, and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines on sustainable wilderness are common, but there are few publications on war zones.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Vee puhastamiseks on eri viise, mõned on konkreetsete ohtude vastu tõhusamad. Mõnes piirkonnas piisab vee keetmisest minut aega, teisal tuleb seda teha mitu minutit. Filtrite tõhusus varieerub ja kui muretsete, peaksite kaaluma kinnises pudelis usaldusväärse tootja pudelivee ostmist.
mt: There are different ways to purify water, some are more effective against specific threats. In some areas, water can be boiled for a minute, in others it must be boiled for several minutes. The effectiveness of filters varies and if you are concerned, you should consider buying bottled water from a reputable manufacturer.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Tagasivoolu hoovuste puhul põrkab veevool rannast tagasi, tihtipeale karist või millestki sarnasest. Veealuste maapinnavormide tõttu liigub naasev veevoog paari sügavamasse kohta ja seal võib moodustuda kiire hoovus, mis suundub sügavatesse vetesse. Enamiku surmadest põhjustab hoovusele vastu ujudes tekkiv väsimus, sest see võib olla võimatu ülesanne. Niipea kui olete hoovusest väljas, pole tagasi ujumine tavapärasest raskem. Püüdke liikuda kusagile, kus see teid uuesti kaasa ei kisuks, või juhul kui teil pole piisavalt oskusi ja teid on märgatud, võite oodata päästemeeskonda.
mt: In a backwash, the water flow bounces off the shore, often crashing or something similar. Due to waterlogged landforms, the incoming water flow moves deeper and there may form a fast current that flows into deep waters. Most deaths are caused by exhaustion from swimming against the current, as this may be an impossible task. Once you are out of the current, it is not harder to swim back. Try to move to somewhere where it does not pull you back, or if you do not have enough skills and you are spotted, you can wait for the rescue team.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Sisemaa veeteede ümbrus on hea koht, kus oma puhkus veeta. Näiteks võite külastada losse Loire'i orus, Reini orus või osaleda Doonau huvitavate linnade kruiisil või sõita paadiga mööda Erie kanalit. Samuti suunavad need populaarsete matka- ja jalgrattaradade marsruute.
mt: The interior waterways are a good place to spend your vacation. For example, you can visit the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley, or take a cruise of the Danube's interesting cities or sail along the Erie Canal. They also direct popular hiking and biking routes.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Piirkonda piirab põhja pool Sahel ja lõuna ning lääne pool Atlandi ookean. Naised: naisreisijatel on olenemata perekonnaseisust soovitatav öelda, et nad on abielus. Samuti tuleb kasuks kanda sõrmust (aga mitte sellist, mis näeb liiga kallis välja. Naised peavad mõistma, et kultuurierinevuste tõttu võidakse teha midagi, mida nemad peavad ahistamiseks, ja ebatavaline pole jälitamine, käest haaramine jne. Öelge meestele kindlameelselt ei ja ärge kartke endale kindlaks jääda (kultuurilised erinevused või mitte, see ei tähenda, et see oleks ok!)
mt: 1. The area is bordered by the Sahel to the north, the Atlantic Ocean to the south and west. 2. Women: women travelers are advised to say they are married regardless of marital status. Also, it is helpful to wear a ring (but not one that looks too expensive. Women should understand that due to cultural differences, they may be treated as if they are being harassed, and it is not unusual to be followed, grabbed, etc. Tell men firmly no and do not be afraid to be identified (cultural differences or not, this does not mean it is okay!)
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Piirkonda piirab põhja pool Sahel ja lõuna ning lääne pool Atlandi ookean. Naised: naisreisijatel on olenemata perekonnaseisust soovitatav öelda, et nad on abielus. Samuti tuleb kasuks kanda sõrmust (aga mitte sellist, mis näeb liiga kallis välja. Naised peavad mõistma, et kultuurierinevuste tõttu võidakse teha midagi, mida nemad peavad ahistamiseks, ja ebatavaline pole jälitamine, käest haaramine jne. Öelge meestele kindlameelselt ei ja ärge kartke endale kindlaks jääda (kultuurilised erinevused või mitte, see ei tähenda, et see oleks ok!)
mt: 1. The area is bordered by the Sahel to the north, the Atlantic Ocean to the south and west. 2. Women: women travelers are advised to say they are married regardless of marital status. Also, it is helpful to wear a ring (but not one that looks too expensive. Women should understand that due to cultural differences, they may be treated as if they are being harassed, and it is not unusual to be followed, grabbed, etc. Tell men firmly no and do not be afraid to be identified (cultural differences or not, this does not mean it is okay!)
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Loodus on fotograafi jaoks üks kõige keerukamaid motiive ja selle puhul on vaja nii head õnne, kannatlikkust, kogemust kui ka head varustust. Loodusfotograafiat võetakse sageli enesestmõistetavana, kuid nagu üldiselt fotograafia puhul, on pilt väärt tuhat sõna. Loodusfotograafia nõuab tihti pikka telefoto objektiivi, kuigi sellised asjad nagu linnuparv või pisielukad vajavad teisi objektiive. Mitmeid eksootilisi loome on raske leida ja parkides on mõnikord reeglid kommertseesmärgil fotode tegemise kohta. Metsloomad võivad olla kas arad või agressiivsed. Keskkond võib olla külm, kuum või muul viisil vaenulik.
mt: Nature is one of the most challenging subjects for a photographer and requires good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Nature photography is often taken for granted, but as with photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Nature photography often requires a long telephoto lens, although things like bird flocks or small animals require other lenses. Many exotic creatures are hard to find and there are often rules in place for commercial purposes for taking pictures in parks. Wildlife can be either shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot or otherwise hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Kõik, kes sõidavad kõrgetel laiuskraadidel või üle mäekurude, peaks võtma arvesse võimalust, et seal võib esineda lund, jääd või madalaid temperatuure. Jäistel ja lumistel maanteedel on hõõrdejõud väike ning te ei saa sõita samamoodi nagu siis, kui olete paljal asfaldil. Lumetormi ajal võib lühikese aja jooksul piisavalt lund sadada, et kinni jääda. Nähtavust võib piirata ka langev või lendlev lumi või siis kondensatsioon või jää sõiduki akendel. Teisest küljest on jäised ja lumised tingimused mitmetes riikides tavapärased ning liiklus jätkub kogu aasta vältel enam-jaolt pidevalt.
mt: For those who travel at high latitudes or over mountain passes, it is important to consider the possibility of snow, ice or low temperatures. On icy and snowy roads, you cannot drive as you would on a paved road. In a snowstorm, enough snow can fall in a short time to get stuck. Visibility can be reduced by falling or drifting snow or by condensation or ice on the windshield. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are common in many countries and traffic continues throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Kui te pole just diplomaat, tähendab välismaal töötamine, et peate oma asukohariigis täitma tuludeklaratsiooni. Tulumaks on eri riikides erinevalt üles seatud ja maksumäärad ning maksuastmed varieeruvad riigist riiki märkimisväärselt. Mõnedes föderaalriikides, nagu näiteks Ameerika Ühendriigid ja Kanada, maksustatakse tulumaks nii föderaalsel kui ka kohalikul tasandil, seega võivad määrad ja vahemikud piirkondade vahel erineda.
mt: If you are not a diplomat, working abroad means you have to file a tax return in your home country. Tax rates and brackets vary widely from country to country. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, taxes are levied both at the federal and local level, so rates and brackets can vary between regions.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: World's Fair (nimetatakse sageli nimega World Exposition või lihtsalt Expo – maailmanäitus) on suur rahvusvaheline kunstide ja teaduste festival. Osalevad riigid esitavad paviljonides kunstipäraseid ja hariduslikke väljapanekuid, et tutvustada maailma probleeme või oma riigi kultuuri ning ajalugu. Rahvusvahelised aiandusnäitused on eriüritused, kus demonstreeritakse lilleseadeid, botaanikaaedu ja kõike muud taimedega seotut. Kuigi teoorias võivad need toimuda igal aastal (seni, kuni need on erinevates riikides), siis praktikas see nii ei ole. Need üritused kestavad tavaliselt kolm kuni kuus kuud ja toimuvad paikades, mis on vähemalt 50 hektari suurused.
mt: A World's Fair (often referred to as a World Exposition or simply Expo) is a large international exhibition designed to showcase achievements of modern industry to the world, and a particular international achievement of a certain country during a certain era. It is intended to have no commercial interest, but for nations to share their discoveries and advances in various fields. The first World's Fair took place in 1851 in London, England. The most recent World's Fair took place in 2010 in Shanghai, China. The next World's Fair will be held in Milan, Italy in 2015.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Kuigi paljud pargi loomad on harjunud inimesi nägema, on tegemist ikkagi metsiku loodusega ja seda ei tohiks häirida. Pargivõimude sõnul tuleb karudest ja huntidest hoida vähemalt 100 jardi/meetri kaugusele ning kõigist teistest metsloomadest 25 jardi/ meetri kaugusele! Ükskõik kui rahulikud nad ka välja ei näeks, võivad piisonid, vapitid, põdrad, karud ja peaaaegu kõik suured loomad rünnata. Igal aastal saab kümneid külastajaid vigastada, kuna nad ei hoidnud õiget vahemaad. Tegemist on suurte, metsikuteja potentsiaalselt ohtlike loomadega, seega jätke neile vajalik ruum. Samuti peate teadma, et lõhnad meelitavad ligi karusid ja muid metsloomi, nii et ärge kandke kaasas või küpsetage tugevalõhnalisi toite ning hoidke laager puhtana.
mt: While many of the park's animals are used to seeing people, it is still a wild environment and should not be disturbed. Park officials say that you should keep zebras and hyenas at least 100 yards away and all other wildlife at least 25 yards away! Even if they look friendly, wildebeests, baboons, antelopes, zebras, and almost all large animals can attack. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured because they did not keep the proper distance. This is a large, wild, and potentially dangerous animal, so give it the space it needs. Also, you should know that smells attract zebras and other wildlife, so do not bring food or cook food with strong smells.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
